1.content: All right, first of all we have to choose a yu-gi-oh season. So which of the four seasons we will choose?
1.title: Let's start

11.content: We choose the first season of Yu-gi-oh, now we have to choose the lucky girl that will find the card.
11.title: Yu-gi-oh

111.content: Where dose she find it?
111.title: Tea Gardner

choices: Tea decides to keep the card
1111.content:
Tea was walking along his trio of friends, Yugi, Joey and Tristan after finishing school and they were headed for the card shop. As always Joey and Tristan were having their usual arguments calling eachothers monkeys and acting like idiots. Tea was walking ahead with Yugi and was exasperated from Joey and Tristan attitude

“Seriously. Will those two ever change? Always arguing for the most stupid reasons” Tea commented

“Come on Tea, I know that Joey and Tristan sometimes are, well…” Yugi tried to say something

“…annoying?” Tea asked with sarcasm all over her face

“…iperactive. But they are our friends Tea” Yugi finished

“I know Yugi, but still I wish they were not so loud” Tea said and then she thought “that way we could also spend more quality time together” Tea smiled when then Joey bumped into her causing her to fall

“Oh so that’s how you want to play huh?” Joey got up without even apologizing to Tea and restarted quarreling with Tristan. Tea, on the ground slowly got up helped by Yugi

“I definitely need some female friend” Tea said with anger in her head. While Tea was dusting her clothes, she saw that Yugi was telling to his two friends to stop acting like buffoons. Tea appreciated very much Yugi’s work and thought “Yugi is always so kind and brave. Huh If only he had the body of hunk he will be the perfect man” Tea finished her thoughts when Joey and Tristan apologized to her for what they did.

Tea reacted angrily “Can’t you guys act like normal people and not like baboons for a change?” causing Yugi to laugh “but alright you guys are forgiven, if you promise to stop acting like this”

“Promise” Both Joey and Tristan said but Tea thought “Yeah right, give them a couple of hours and they will start their monkey show once again” and with that they moved on.

After a few minutes they arrived at Yugi’s card game shop and while the boys decided to talk with Granpa Muto to see if any new card had arrived, Tea decided to have a look around and see if there was something interesting in her way. So she looked around, but found absolutely nothing that seemed interesting , until suddenly she heard a whisper

“Come here” the whisper said

“What the? Who said that?” Tea asked

“Come here. What you are searching for is here” the whisper continued.

Curious by those words, Tea decided to follow that mysterious voice and it lead her in the back store, looking on the shelf there she found that something was shining right behind a few boxes. Tea moved the boxes away and found that the mysterious glow and whisper came from a card. Tea took it and saw what card was it and so she read the text "GIRL'S WORLD: This card can only be activated by a female duellist. If this card is activated female gender monsters gain 500 attack and defense points and cannot be destroyed in battle, while male gender monsters lose 500 attack and defense points. Once activeted this card cannot be destroyed. If your opponent is a male duellist, if he loses the duel, this card will change him into a female duellist".

What will happen next?
1111.title: The game shop

choices: Tea decides to keep this card as well
11112.content:
As soon as she finished reading the text of the card, Tea wondered if it was a joke or if it was true

"Well considering all the weird things that have happened to me so far, I might as well believe it" Tea thought and so decided to put the card away thinking that it may come useful someday. She was about to return to the main room of the shop, when suddenly she noticed another glow. She went down the hall and found another card. She took it and started to read

"Girl's dream, continuos spell card. All female monsters gain 300 attack points. When this card is activated if a female monster on your side of the field destroys in battle a male monster on your opponent side, that monster is resurected as a female monster on your side of the field. This card cannot be activated if Girl's World is active. If the duelist who controls this card wins the duel, it can change the apparence and the memory of the opponent" Tea finished reading
11112.title: Tea finds another card

111121.content:
As soon as she finished reading the text of this second card, Tea made her decision

“I’m going to keep these 2 cards, and I’m going to test them on the guys” Tea thought and then with a wicked smile on her face, she put the cards away in her pocket and then she returned to the main room of the shop.

Once she was about to enter she almost crushed into Yugi.

“Tea I was worried about you, what happened?” Yugi asked

“Oh nothing. I needed to visit the girl’s room, but I forgot it was not this way” Tea responded with an innocent look on her face

“Yeah, it’s that way” Yugi said with his face turning red while pointing to the toilette room behind him

“Thanks” Tea said and with that she went in that direction, also because she really needed to use the toilette. Once she returned the boys were all set and ready to go. Tea decided to take this opportunity. As soon as Joey and Tristan left the shop, she stopped and talked with Yugi for a moment ”Yugi I have a little favour to ask you”

“Sure what is it Tea?” Yugi asked

“Well, you see. After watching you guys duel for such a long time, I decided to try it myself, only I do not have a lot of cards, and I’m also not very good in strategizing. So I was wondering if you could help me Improve my deck and my skills a bit” Tea asked

“Sure thing no problem” Yugi answered with a big smile on his face and then continued “If you want we can do it tonight”

“That will be great” Tea responded with a big smile on her face and then she gave Yugi a kiss on the cheek, causing Yugi to become all red once again “So I’ll see you later Yugi”

“Sure thing Tea, I’ll be waiting” Yugi responded.

And with that, Tea left the shop and ran back to her home in order to take all the cards she had in her current possession. She knew that she did not have many of them, but she was sure that with Yugi’s help she could create a very good deck
111121.title: Tea decides to keep this card as well

1111211.content:
Tea had just finished preparing all her cards in a box, but she carefully made sure not to put the two new cards that she had found in Yugi’s shop earlier that day

“All right. Everything is ready. Now all I need is a good teacher than I can only hope that my plan will work” Tea said and with that she exited her house with her cards and headed for Yugi’s house

In a matter of moments Tea arrived at her destination, and once she was there she was greeted by Yugi

“Hi Tea, you sure have arrived earlier than I expected” Yugi commented with an happy smile on his face

“Hi Yugi, well yeah, I finished what I had to do, earlier than I expected, so Idecided to come here a little bit sooner. I hope that is okay with you” Tea asked with her big puppies eyes

“Of course Tea, there is no problem at all. Now shall we go inside si that I can offer you a drink as well?” Yugi asked by completely opening the door

“Thanks Yugi” Tea said and with that she entered the house.

Once inside, Yugi escorted Tea to the living room and once she let her seat on a chair, he went back to the kitchen in order to prepare a drink, while Tea took all her cards out from her box and prepared herself for the lesson. Once Yugi returned with the beverage, he sat next to Tea and they decided to get started
1111211.title: Later that night

11112111.content:
An hour has passed from the moment that Tea had arrived at Yugi’s house, and ever since that moment, Yugi have given Tea several new cards she could use to strengthen her deck of female characters and he also explained her a lot of very good strategies that she could use in a duel

“Well Tea, I don’t see what else I can teach you. You are a very fast learner” Yugi said

“Thanks Yugi. You are very sweet” Tea said blushing a bit

“Iiiff you want, we could have a little duel to see how your deck works” Yugi proposed while blushing for Tea’s comment

“Thanks Yugi, but no thanks. I want to test this deck with someone a little bit less of a champion, before I come after you, but do not worry, as soon as I fell I’m ready I’ll challenge you. Do not worry” Tea responded

“As you wish Tea. Would you like to stay for dinner?” Yugi asked hoping she would answer yes

“Sorry Yugi, but I have to go I have dance class in about an hour and I forgot my bag at home” Tea answered but then she saw Yugi sad face and continued “But don’t worry. We will catch up next time” Tea responded and with that she gave him a kiss on the cheek

After that Yugi, red as a tomato, escorted Tea downstairs to the exit and after a couple of byes, she left for her house.
11112111.title: About 1 hour later

111121111.content:
Once Tea arrived at home she wasted no time in going to her room. Once she was there she searched for the two cards she have found earlier that day. As soon as she got them she put them in her deck and shuffled it.

“Good, now my deck is ready. I cannot wait to test it tomorrow. But first I must prepare myself, my dancing lesson will begin shortly, and I need to get ready” Tea thought while preparing her bag and putting on a new shirt.

Once she was ready she put her deck inside one of her desk drawer and left.


3 hours later:

Tea has returned home from her dancing class, and after putting all of her stuff in the washing machine, she changed herself and went straight to bed. She couldn’t wait for tomorrow to arrive.
111121111.title: At Tea's house

1111211111.content:
Around 6.30 in the morning, Tea’s alarm clock started to work, Tea immediately woke up.

“Today is the day” Tea said with a smile on her face, and with that she got up from bed and went immediately to prepare herself. In about 20 minutes, Tea was ready, she got her new duel disk, her deck and her schoolbag.

“All right. Ready for part 1 of my plan” Tea said and with that she exited her house and headed straight for
1111211111.title: In the morning

11112111111.content:
After a good walk Tea finally arrived at Tristan’s house, and she arrived just in time to see Tristan coming out of it.

“Hi Tristan” Tea called him.

“Hello Tea” Tristan responded surprised to see his friend, and so he asked “What’s up?” .

“Oh nothing, it’s just that with all the talking about dueling I decided to give it a shot myself. And since we are both amateurs, I thought that maybe we can have our first duel together.” And with that Tea took out her dueldisk “What do you say?” Tea asked hoping.

Tristan thought about that a for a moment and the accepted “ All right. Let’s do it”. Tristan than went back inside and took his dueldisk. After preparing themselves, both Tea and Tristan said “LET’S DUEL”.

“Ladies first” Tea said, and with that she drew a card “ I summon Lady Kicker in attack mode (ATT 1500, DEF 800)” and with that a female monster warrior girl with incredible strong legs appeared “Next I put down a face down and end my turn” Tea said.

“All right my turn” Tristan said while drawing a card “ I summon Cyber Commander in defense mode (ATT 750, DEF 700) and with a card face down I end my turn.” Tristan said while his monster and another card appeared on his field.

Tea then draw her second card…
11112111111.title: Tristan's house

111121111111.content:
As soon as Tea looked at the card she just drew a smile appeared on her face.

"Get ready Tristan" she said " I activate my new field spell GIRLS'S WORLD" and with that she activated the card. Once activated, everything around the two duelists started to change, Tristan and Tea were now surrounded by dolls, cosmetics, fashion, and everything a girl will love. Tristan was really confused.

"What in the world is this Tea?" He asked and Tea responded.

"It's my new field spell Tristan, and trust me when I say that this is a very powerful card. First of all it cannot be destroyed, second every single female monster on the field gains 500 extra attack and defense points, plus it cannot be destroyed in battle. On the other hand, the male monsters lose 500 attack and defense point." Tea explained with a grin on her face to an open-mouthed Tristan.

"WHAT?" Tristan asked, but the answer came in a matter of seconds once he saw Tea’s Lady Kicker attack and defense points raise to 2000 and 1300, fortunately since his Cyber Commander was a machine monster, it was unaffected by the field spell.

At that moment, Tristan asked " Wait a minute, if I remember correctly there cannot be such a powerful card without paying a price."

Tea then responded " Yes there is but you will see it only at the end of our duel, but for now I play a female monster called The Temptress to double your fun” and with that a seductive monster with 1600 Attack and 1200 Defense points “And like Lady Kicker, she increases her attack and defense power by 500 point” Tea said and with that The Temptress became stronger “ Now for the fun part, if Lady Kicker attacks a monster in defense mode she takes away 500 of your life points. Now Lady Kicker attack” Tea ordered her monster.

“I activate a trap, Mirror force” Tristan desperately said.

“In that case, I activate my counter trap, Girl’s shield, this trap prevents my female monster from being effected by any card effect for the rest of the turn” Tea countered and with that Tristan trap card was deactivated and his monster was destroyed by Lady Kicker. The score was Tea 4000, Tristan 3500.

“Now Temptress attack him directly” Tea ordered her second monster. The score was now Tea 4000, Tristan 1400. “I now activate the Temptress special ability, whenever she successfully attacks you directly, a temptress token is summoned on your side of the field” Tea explained and with that a monster token that looked like an heart with an harrow in it with 500 attack and defense power, appeared on Tristan field.

“What’s this for?” Tristan asked confused.

“It’s a surprise” Tea smirked and then finished “Now I place 2 cards face down and I end my turn”.
111121111111.title: Girls' World

1111211111112.content:
While Tristan was fighting against Tea, Joey was about to leave for school.

“All right I think I got everything, no wait I cannot forget my dueldisk” Joey said while taking his precious dueldisk and putting it in his bag.

“All right time to go” Joey exited his house and waited for Tristan to come.

Noticing that his friend was not coming, Joey started to wait “That’s odd. Tristan has never been punctual, but never this late. Better go and see if everything is okay” .

And with that Joey started to walk toward Tristan’s house.
1111211111112.title: Meanwhile Joey

11112111113.content: Who other house could it be?
11112111113.title: Other choices

choices: Mai decided to test this card
Mai thought this is all a bunch of rubbish
112.content:
Mai Valentine, one of the greatest female duelist the world as ever known, was about to wake up after a good night sleep. When she woke up, Mai started to prepare herself, because that day was a very important day for her, it was the day of the final match of the eleventh duel monster tournament that she had participed in the last three months. She had won all the ten previous tournament and she was starting to get quite famous around the world for her duelling skills, and now she was ready to win her eleventh tournament. After taking a shower, get dressed, taking her duel disk and her deck she exited the house and went to her motorbike. After putting her elmet on she started the engine and then she headed for the tournament.
A couple of hours later...
Mai exited the dueling arena with the first prize trophy, all happy that she was able to win another time, she decided to spent the rest of her day shopping in Domino city. Once there she went shopping for new dresses, jewelery and so on, with her good mood to the maximum. After finishing shopping, she stopped to a bar and got something to drink, she heard the television news, and they were talking about the best duelists in the world. Hopping to be on that news, Mai got closer to the Tv and started listening. The speaker started talking " Yugi Muto once again confirmed to be the king of games, right after him Seto Kaiba take the silver medal, and even though Joey willer has lost a few matches, the statistic indicates that he can win the bronze on a global competition of Duel Monsters, and then..." and the speaker continued but he never mentioned Mai. Upset with that, Mai took her shopping bags and her trophy and decided to went back home. Once she arrived at home and put all her stuff on the table, Mai jumped on her bed and started thinking "Yugi and Joey, why is always those two, why can't i ever be on the news, sure Yugi is the king of game and all that but Joey? Come on! He is good but not better than me, he just defeated me once, I wish for another chance, a chance to defeat him". Mai was really upset and extremly greedy for a rematch with Joey when suddenly a strange light shined on the table of her room; once it was over Mai went to her table and saw a duel monsters card, and so she took it in her hand. She never saw a card like that, it was a field spell card and so, overcome by curiosity, Mai read the card "GIRL'S WORLD: This card can only be activated by a female duellist. If this card is activated female gender monsters gain 500 attack and defense points and cannot be destroyed in battle, while male gender monsters lose 500 attack and defense points. Once activeted this card cannot be destroyed. If your opponent is a male duellist, if he loses the duel, this card will change him into a female duellist". What will happen next?
112.title: Mai Valentine

1121.content:
Once Mai finished to read the card she thought "I always thought that there is no such thing like magic in this world, but from the day I met Yugi I witnessed alot of very strange and misterious events, like the shadow games with Marik and also the seal of orichalcos of Darts. Maybe this card is like those, or maybe it's just a fake. Well anyway it doesn't hurt to try it. I'll reorganize my entire deck tonight and when it's done I will challenge Joey and take my revenge on him." And with that determination and thirst for victory, Mai took out her deck and all the cards in her possession and started to built a new one.
The next morning
Mai stayed up all night in order to create her new deck and at dawn, she said " Yes, finally it's complete. Now it's time to test it, and Joey will be my first victim". And with that, Mai took her cellphone and started to call Joey in order to challenge him. What will Joey say?
1121.title: Mai decided to test this card

11211.content:
M"Joey, it's been a while
J"It's sure has Mai. How are you doing?"
M"I'm fine thank you, I just happen to have created an extremly powerful deck and I'd like to test it. Would you like to be my opponent Joey?"
J"Of course Mai.I'm always happy to challenge you. When and where do we duel?"
11211.title: He accept of course

112112.content: Mai proposed at sunset on the pier of Domino city, a place full of memories for both her and Joey
112112.title: Other choices

1121121.content: At the sunset two duelists were starring eachother down at the pier of Domino city, a boy and a young woman. It's sure has been a long time since the two of them have seen eachother, and after the usual "How are you doing? It's been so long since we saw eachother, I missed you" the two duelists decided to go down to business right away. "Before we start Mai, can I ask you something?" "Sure Joey what is it?" "With all the great duelists we know why did you choose me?" Mai waited a few seconds before answering " Well first of all becauseI still have a score to settle with you, but also because I think you are a great duelist" "Really Mai? You mean it?" "Of course silly" But then Mai grinned and thought "Plus I cannot wait the expression on your face once I'll defeat you and turn you into a girl, that is of course if the card really works". After that, they both activeted their dueldisks and said "No more time for cheat chat Mai" "Yeah time to get serious Joey" " LET'S DUEL" and with that the duel started. Who will make the first move?
1121121.title: Perfect choice

11211211.content: "Ladies first Joey" Mai said by drawing her first card. She then looked at her hand, she didn't have her new card, at least not yet. "I'll start by summoning cyber harpy in attack mode ATT 1800, DEF 1300, then I place 2 cards face down and end my turn" Mai said. "Very well, my move " responded Joey " and I'll play my panther warrior in attack mode ATT 2000, DEF 1600, since he needs a sacrifice in order to attack I cannot attack during this turn, so I also play 2 cards face down and back to you Mai" finished Joey " Not bad Joey, not bad at all" responded Mai, causing Joey to roister, just like she planned. "Perfect, he letn his guard down, this will be the perfect moment to attack, I just wish I draw that card right now. Well, only one way to find out" Mai thought, and with that she said "My turn, draw". What card did she draw?
11211211.title: Mai

112112111.content: As soon as Mai looked at the card she just drew a smile appeared on her face. " Get ready Joey" she said " I activate my new field spell GIRLS'S WORLD" and with that she activated the card. Once activated, everything around the two duelists started to change, Joey and Mai were now surrounded by dolls, cosmetica, fashion, and everything a girl will love. Joey was really confused, " What in the world is this Mai?" He asked and Mai responded " It's my new field spell Joey, and trust me when I say that this is a very powerful card. First of all it cannot be destroyed, second every single female monster on the field gains 500 extra attack and defense points, plus it cannot be destroyed in battle. On the other hand, the male monsters lose 500 attack and defense point." Mai explained with a grin on her face to an open-mouthed Joey " WHAT?" Asked Joey, but the answer came in a matter of seconds once he saw his panther warrior's attack and defense points drop to 1500 and 1100, while those of cyber harpie raised to 2300 and 1800. At that moment, Joey asked " Wait a minute, there cannot be such a powerful card without paying a price." Mai then responded " Yes there is but you will see it only at the end of our duel, but for now I play another cyber harpie to double your fun, and like the first one she increase her attack and defense power by 500 points. Now cyber harpie 1 destroy his panther warrior" . And with that order cyber harpie attacked her opponent, but then Joey shouted "I activate a trap Magic arm shield, with this trap I can use one of your monster as a shield, and I choose to use your other cyber harpie" But as soon as the trap was activated Mai countered " i don't think so, I play a trap card of my own, harpie's veil, thanks to this trap card for this turn any monster with harpie in its name cannot be effected by magic, trap or monster's effects" "WHAT?" asked Joey but it was obvious since his trap card was destroyed and so Mai harpie attacked and destroyed Joey's panther warrior, making his life points go down to 3200. "Now cyber harpie 2 attack him directly" Mai shouted but then Joey countered "I activate scapegoat" and with that 4 token appeard on the field, and one of them was destroyed by the cyber harpie's attack "You were able to save yourself, I didn't thought you could have done it. Well I place one more card face down and end my turn" Mai said with a smile on her face. "It's my turn then" Joey said confident but in his voice you could hear a note of nervousism. How will the duel procede?
112112111.title: Girl's world

1121121111.content: " My move, I draw" Joey said and looked at his card, it was Jinzo. Joey then had an idea and decided to test his strategy "I play monster reborn in order to bring back my panther warrior in attack mode " and once again his monster, as soon as he was summoned, lost 500 attack and defense points. Mai laughed "Oh your poor panther has seen better days" but Joey kept his cool "I know sacrifice my panther in order to summon Jinzo ( Att 2400, Def 1500), and so one of Joey's most powerful monsters appeared. Mai waited for Girl's world to do its job, but Jinzo didn't lose any points "What? Why?" asked Mai confused, while Joey was celebrating "Oh yeah, just like I thought" "What do you mean?" asked Mai "Girl's world's effect target monsters with a gender, but Jinzo is a machine, and machine don't have a gender so your card is useless against Jinzo. Plus with this monster out, you cannot use trap cards" Joey explained leaving Mai speechless "Now Jinzo attack her cyber harpie" and with that Jinzo attacked Mai's monster, but even after the attack, cyber harpie was still standing. Joey looked at Mai for an explanation "Have you forgot? Female monsters cannot be destroyed in battle if Girl's world is active, but congratulations Joey you actually damaged my life points" Mai responded. The score was now Mai 3900, Joey 3200. "i end my turn" was Joey's answer. "Very well. My move "Mai said, and with that she drew a card.
1121121111.title: Joey tries to counter attack

11211211111.content: Mai looked at the card she just drew and said "I play my pot of greed so I can draw two more cards" and so she did it. After that she looked at her two new cards and smilled "First, I summon my third cyber harpie to the field" and with that, a third cyber harpie was summoned. Mai then continued "Next I'll activate a continues magic card, "Girl's alliance"" Joey make a confused expression, "What is that card?" he asked to Mai, "You see this cards allows all my female monsters to gain an additional 200 extra attack points for every female monster on my field, so since I have three girls out, they all gains 600 extra attack points." Mai explained "WHAT?" Joey screamed "Which means my harpies have now 2900 attack points, more than enough to destroy your Jinzo. So cyber harpie 1 attack his Jinzo now" Mai ordered and with that Cyber harpie destroyed Jinzo "Now cyber harpie 2 and 3, destroy two f his three scapegoat"and so they did. Joey was now left with only one monster. "Don't forget, now that Jinzo is gone, my trap cards are finally free, so now I activate one of my face downs "Girl's blast", which allows me to inflict you a damage to your life points equal to the number of girls on my field multiplied for 300, so now you'll lose 900 extra life points". And with that Joey's life points became 1800. "With this I end my turn" Mai said smiling while Joey was still trying to recover from that last attack " All right Mai, here goes. It's my turn" Joey said
11211211111.title: The duel continues

112112111111.content:
Joey thought for a minute before drawing his next card. It was really odd how the field was smeared in pink. Joey hadn't seen cards like this ever before, and he knew something was up.

That card was abnormally powerful and he wanted to find a way around it.

"Come on Joey! Show me what you've got!"

Teà was right, he drew the card swiftly and smoothly between two of his fingers.

His hand was:

Monster Reborn
Baby Dragon
Time Machine

And he just drew:
112112111111.title: The duel continues

1121121111111.content:
He'd just drawn "Giant Trunade", a card that can put every Spell and Trap card on the field back to the owner's hand.

Girl's World can't be destroyed, but it can be returned to the hand! There was his solution! He smirked gleefully and shouted:

"Giant Trunade!"

Teà gawped in horror as Joey hit the Duel Disk with the card. Girl's world and all of its effects vanished.

"Monster Reborn!" he screamed confidently.

Joey felt very proud of himself for producing such a turnabout this late in the game.

"Jinzo is brought back from beyond the grave!" Joey stated.

Jinzo arose from the floor of the field.

So, what's he going to do now?
1121121111111.title: Giant Trunade

11211211111112.content:
Joey was About to attack but decided to make some preparations.

Now that Girl's world was gone, he was able to decipher that the Harpies no longer had a 500 ATK bonus, so it was 2400 each.

"I set one face-down card!"

"...And one face down monster!"

Two face down cards were now visible on the field.

He would attack next turn.
11211211111112.title: Attack!

112112111111121.content:
"All right! My turn!"

Teà drew a card. She only had two cards in her hand, and amongst these were "Girl's World" and...
112112111111121.title: Tea's turn.

1121121111111212.content:
When Teà glanced up on the card, it was a bittersweet feeling. It was a good card, but it was not the right time to use it. She smiled and thought about using it next turn to finish of Joey old-school style.

...But what did she decide to do?
1121121111111212.title: Feather of the Pheonix

11211211111112121.content:
It was Joey's turn now, he drew a card and then inquired:

"Hey! Why'd you just end your turn?"

"You'll see." Said Tea, slyly.

Joey was a bit confused. The card he had drawn was Lightning Vortex, and he was going to use it to get rid of the Harpies. But, he saw that Girl's World was active again, and in future he'd have to remember the correct time to use Giant Trunade.

"Ok, here goes!"

Joey placed the Lightning Vortex on the centre spell card zone.

Tea looked over to were joey was standing, and was instantly beguiled by the electricity that was pouring out from an unknown source.

All of her Harpies were sent to the graveyard! It was Lightning Vortex!

"Rats, I should have ended this last turn!" Mumbled Tea.

"Hahah, it ain't over yet."

Joey raised a finger and pointed it at the face down.

"Baby Dragon! Wake up!"

And wake up he did.
11211211111112121.title: End her turn.

112112111111121211.content:
Joey ordered them to attack, and they were more than happy to oblige. Baby Dragon used a spinning a slashing attack to take out 1200 points of damage, and Jinzo dealt out 2400 with his crisp, high tech, plasmatic laser beam!

"Yeeeeah!"

Joey was on top of the world! Just look at the turnabout!
112112111111121211.title: Let's attack!

1121121111111212111.content:
Tea had just taken a whopping 3600 points of damage! Leaving her at 4000!

She sure hoped this next card would change the tables. She drew:
1121121111111212111.title: Tea's turn.

11211211111112121111.content:
When Tea drew this card, she couldn't help but laugh out loud at Joey's fate.

"I'm going to set a face-down monster and activate Girl's World again."

"I end my turn!"
11211211111112121111.title: Penguin Soldier.

112112111111121211111.content:
"My turn!"

Joey and Teà were easily enjoying the duel, although Joey saw something eerie in it. Joey had drawn...
112112111111121211111.title: Joey's turn!

1121121111111212111112.content:
Joey was a bit beguiled by this, Polymerisation? Up until now, what he was drawing turned out to be just what he needed, but Polymerisation? He didn't know what to do with that.

He set it face-down.

"I end my turn."
1121121111111212111112.title: Polymerisation.

11211211111112121111121.content:

121.content:
It was the end of a very busy day for the top female student at Duel Accademy,Alexis Rhodes. She started her day with a five hours lesson with Doctor Crawler and, unlike almost all her of her friends who spent the entire lesson sleeping, she was focused all the time.

When the lesson was over, she went with her two best friends, Mindy and Jasmine, to the lunch room and even if she tried to enjoy the meal, she couldn't because her two friends were talking all the time about their 2 favourites arguments: cute boys and find one that can become Alexis's fiancé.

When the lunch was over, Alexis had another problem: Chazz. That guy with a massive ego always had a crush for her, so he spent almost 2 hours trying to have a date with her, and Alexis spent those two hours escaping from him. Once she was sure that Chazz has given up, at least for one day, she decided to relax in the best way possible: duelling. So she decided to go to the Duel Accademy training camps in order to have a few matches with some other students.

Being the top female student in Duel Accademy, Alexis won nine match in a row, against two slifers, three ras and four obelisks, three guys and one girl; winning those matches sure gave Alexis back her energy so she decided to have another challenge in order to have ten wins for the day, when suddenly Jaden Yuki arrived at the training camps.

Once Alexis saw him she thought "Today I'm in great shape, I think I can beat Jaden" and so Alexis challenged his friend with the red uniform to a duel, but unfortunatly even with all her confidence, Alexis was once again defeated by Jaden, and even though Jaden's good mood was enough to cure pratically everything, this time the wound in Alexis's pride was too deep. Even though Jaden was a great friend, Alexis was never able to defeat him in a duel, not even once; she knew that Jaden's skills were extraordinary, and that he only duel for fun, but that did not make things easier. Inside her room, she was lieing down on her bed, lost in her thoughts

"Come on, why can't I beat Jaden just once, I know that he is a great guy and a great friend, but still the fact that he always defeats me with his carefree attitude makes me feel wounded pride:. They call me the top female student in the accademy but still I've never won against him, is there anyway I can defeat Jaden?"

Almost as responding at her request a strange light shined on the table of her bedroom; once it was over Alexis went to her table and saw a duel monsters card, and so she took it in her hand. Alexis never saw a card like that, it was a field spell card and so, overcome by curiosity, Alexis read the card "GIRL'S WORLD: This card can only be activated by a female duellist. If this card is activated female gender monsters gain 500 attack and defense points and cannot be destroyed in battle, while male gender monsters lose 500 attack and defense points. Once activeted this card cannot be destroyed. If your opponent is a male duellist, if he loses the duel, this card will change him into a female duellist".

What will happen next?

"All right, first of all I want her new identity to be Gledis Rhodes, my twin sister, and by that I also mean that she has to be just like me: a very intelligent, governed, social and well mannered girl. A proud member of the obelisk blue team, a model student and of course an excellent duellist, but also always ready to have some fun with her friends. Finally I want her to be totally loyal to her family and especially to me. Oh and lastly make sure that everybody knows who Gledis is, like she has always existed"

"Your wish will be granted mistress." responded the spirit and with that the spell was cast
121111111121.title: Yes, change is mind.

1211111111211.content:
After a flash of light, the new Gledis felt on the ground while the spirit of "Girls's world" vanished, and Alexis was left alone with her new twin sister. She approched her and tried to wake her up. After a few try she succeded

"Hey sis" Alexis said

"Oh hi Alexis, where are we?" Gledis asked

"In the middle of the woods, we were having a walk and then you decided to dooze off" Alexis lied and then smilled "Sleepyhead"

"Hey, come on now, it's not even 7 a.m., you cannot blame me for being a bit tired. Why did you even wanted to take a walk at this hour?" Gledis asked by getting up

"To breath some fresh air. Come on, let's get back to the dorm and have some breakfast" Alexis said and with that she put her arm around her twin's neck

"Sounds good to me" Gledis said by doing the same and then they started to walk back
1211111111211.title: Meet Gledis and Alexis

12111111112111.content:
After a good ten minutes walking, Alexis and Gledis arrived at their dorm, as soon as they entered they found their two best friends waiting for them

"Alexis, Gledis where were you?" asked Jasmine out of curiosity

"Isn't it obvious Jasmine. They went outside for a morning walk with some hotties, ooohhh that's so romantic" Mindy daydreamed.

After hearing that Jasmine said " What? Really? Oh come on you girls, you could at least invite us too"

"We were not out we boys, we were just doing a morning walk" Gledis explained

"Really? And why do you have your dueldisks with you?" Jasmine asked

"We brought them with us in case we wanted to have a duel, but we decided to just have a walk for once" Alexis explained

Mindy and Jasmine were a little disappointed by the answer but then they continued " Well it's nice to know that our two top students: Alexis and Gledis Rhodes, queens of the duelists of the Duel Academy, the wonder twins do more things than great duels." Jasmine proudly said

"True, you two are defeated only when you duel eachothers, and I think the score is now Alexis 83 Gledis 81. But really girls, you two should spend less time dueling and more time dating" Mindy said

"Why should we? You two are already doing that for us right?" asked Gledis

Then Alexis continued " True, the only things you two always talk about are boys and dates"

"That's not true" responded Jasmine a little offended

Mindy finished "Yeah, we also talk about fashion and makeup".

And with that the four girls started laughing. After a good five minutes laugh the four girls decided that it was time for breakfast. The breakfast in the female blue dorm was done in a very big and lighted room, thanks to the big windows all over the walls. The buffet was worthy of a four stars hotel and there were five big tables.

Once the four girls found a good spot, they started having breakfast together

"Come on Alexis, Gledis it's not that bad. Why don't you two want to find yourself a boyfriend?" asked Jasmine to her friends

Alexis responded "Because we don't find it necessary at the moment Jasmine; we prefer to focus ourselves on our studies and on dueling right now" and with that both Alexis and Gledis drank a cup of tea.

Mindy then intervened " Oh come on now girls, you two should enjoy this time of your life"

As soon as Gledis swallowed her toast, she responded " We are enjoying our time, in case you two hadn't notice. We both love dueling, we are making a lot of friends and we also had our share of adventures here. Life at Duel Academy has its ups and downs, but these are defenitly the best years of our life."

Then Alexis intervened " That goes double for me as well, so please girls, let's try to avoid the boyfriend speech. We have already to many admirers on our hands".

Mindy and Jasmine both noticed the serious expressions on Alexis and Gledis's faces and so they gave up

"Ok fine. You two won this round" Jasmine said admitting defeat

"But we will be back for more. This match is not over" Mindy defiantly said, making all of her friends laugh

"Speaking of over" intervened Alexis "we should hurry on finishing breakfast, or we'll be late for class"

"True, we cannot be late" finished Gledis and with that the four girls finished their breakfast and headed for their first period
12111111112111.title: At the blue dorm

121111111121111.content:
The 4 girls got to their class just in time. It was almost time for it to begin, so each girl got to their seat. Gledis and Alexis were in the middle of Jasmine and Mindy.

In a few minutes Dr. Crowler entered from the backdoor and as always he looked mad, this time because some students made a prank on him.

"You know girls, sometimes I wonder why he is so surprised that people make fun of him" Gledis whispered tothe rest of the girls

"Well what do you expect from a baboon?" Jasmine commented causing a group giggle

"Sometimes I even wonder if his first name was Lady Crawler" Mindy continued causing a second group giggle

"Okay okay girls, enough now before he decides to go monkey on us" Alexis commented and with the third giggle the girls became serious again.

Crawler went on with the lecture of Traps and Spells. The four girls were paying attention at first, but Jasmine and Mindy then started looking for boys that would be great for Alexis and Gledis, while the twins continued with discipline to follow the lesson and took very good notes

In 2 hours, class was over, and they had a short 30 minute break till the next class, what do they do?
121111111121111.title: In class

choices: At end of the final morning lesson
At the end of the day
1211111111211111.content:
The four girls decided to go to the card shop in order to have some fun. When they arrived they saw Miss Doroty at the cash desk

"Good morning Miss Doroty" greeted the four girls almost at the same time

"Good morning girls." responded Miss Doroty and so they started talking.

After a few minutes, Miss Doroty suddenly asked "So, how was your first period?" asked miss Doroty

Alexis responded " Oh well, the usual during one of Doctor Crawler's classes: Mindy and Jasmine talked about boys and stuff..."

Gledis then continued "...while Alexis and I took notes of the lesson...But"

"...so once again tonight..." Alexis continued

"...we'll have to lend our notes to them". Gledis finished. The twins speech made their friends blush, while Miss Doroty started laughing

"Oh come on now Gledexis" Jasmine intervened

"Would you stop calling us like that?" Alexis said a bit annoyed

"Yeah, it's not funny" Gledis confirmed

"But seriously girls, you know we respect Doctor C., but his lesson are so boring" Mindy said

"Yeah, besides the two of you, I don't think anybody follows them" Jasmine confirmed

Miss Doroty then intervened "Jasmine, Mindy. Alexis and Gledis are two very well mannered ad discipline girls, and also the best students and duelists of the Academy, therefore they have to sow a good conduct during classes. And you two should do the same, there is time for fun and there is time for work, this is the equilibrium of life, understood?"

"Yes ma'am" Jasmine and Mindy responded

"Good girls, now here are some new cards for the four of you" and with that Miss Doroty gave each one of them a few new cards.

"Thank you Miss Doroty" responded the four girls and with that they went back to class.

Each of the girls again went to their seats again, and sat right before the next lesson
1211111111211111.title: Go to the card shop

12111111112111111.content:
Once the class was dismissed there was a break of about 2 hours for Lunch until the next class.

The four girls decided to eat at the cafeteria with all the other students. Once they arrived they each took a tray and started choosing their meal: Alexis decided to eat a mixed salad and a turkey sandwitch, Gledis instead chose chicken with carrots and greens. While Alexis and Gledis choose two healthy meals, both Mindy and Jasmine decided to eat two big steaks with french fries. Once the girls seated at their table,

"Don't you think you two have exagerated?" Alexis couldn't resist anymore and asked to Mindy and Jasmine

"Why? One plate of meat, even if it is a little big.." Jasmine started to explain

Then Alexis interrupted "A LITTLE BIG?"

"Oh come on Alexis, it's not so bad to eat a plate of steak every once and a while" finished Mindy.

Gledis then intervened "What you two say is true, but this isn't the first time this week that you ate that plate. You should change sometimes, because it will be harder to find cute boys if you two add too much meat to your bones".

After hearing those words both Mindy and Jasmine went back and changed their plates, making both Alexis and Gledis laugh. Once they returned they had plates similar to the ones of their friends and soon they all started to eat together. The girls were enjoying their meal when they were suddenly interrupted by:
12111111112111111.title: At end of the final morning lesson

choices: At the end of the day
121111111121111111.content:
"Hello Ladies. The Chazz is here" Chazz said while joining the four girls for lunch

"Oh brother" Alexis and Gledis said together

"Oh oh here comes the show" Jasmine whispered to Mindy

"And we have front seat for it" Mindy giggled back.

Without even asking, Chazz sat between Alexis and Gledis "How are you two ladies doing today?" Chazz asked

"We were fine until 2 minutes ago" Alexis responded annoyed

"Did you miss me?" Chazz continued

"Like the mosquitos" Gledis finished annoyed as well

"Oh come on you beauties, show the Chazz, how much you love him" Chazz continued by putting his arms on the twins shoulders

Both Alexis and Gledis looked at eachother annoyed by Chazz, but then Gledis noticed a cart near the exit of the canteen, she then noted that to Alexis, who blinked her eye, sign that she understood the plan

"Oh of course Chazzy. Forgive us for being so rude" Alexis said in a very sensual voice

"Here let me feed you Chazzy" Gledis said starting to feed Chazz.

"Now we are talking" Chazz said while he was enjoying the lunch and also the squeeze of the twins bodies on his own

"Poor Chazz" Mindy whispered

"He doesn't even suspect" Jasmine responded giggling

"Come on Chazzy" Alexis said by getting up

"Let's go get some dessert" Gledis continued by getting up herself

"Sure thing ladies" Chazz responded by getting up and then he walked with one twin for arm. Once they arrived near the cart, Alexis and Gledis blinked

"Oops" Gledis said by making Chazz trip and fall on the cart

"Oops" Alexis said to by pushing the cart with her butt causing it to move and going all over to the dessert zone, and causing Chazz to land on the chocolate mousse

"Mmmmhhh that felt good" Alexis commented

"Yeah, nothing like sweet revenge" Gledis approved and with that the two sisters high fived and bounced their butts against eachothers and returned to their seats.

Mindy and Jasmine, who watched the entire scene, laughed along side the entire canteen

"Oh I love their wicked side" Jasmine said

"Agreed" Mindy approved
121111111121111111.title: Chazz Princeton

choices: Later in the day, after class...
1211111111211111111.content:
After lunch, the girls were back in their class but both Mindy and Jasmine noticed that Chazz wasn't in class and was probably licking his pride and dessert off his black coat. Fonda Fontaine was teaching the class, so Alexis and Gledis were paying close attention while Mindy and Jasmine tried to pay attention until Jasmine noticed an obelisk blue member who looked cute enough to be a perfect match for Alexis or Gledis, but didn't know what his name was.

Meanwhile with Chazz, he was in the men's bathroom trying to clean off his coat, steamed as he was rejected by two of the most lovely Obelisk Females and pushed into the dessert cart. However, even with him focused on cleaning the stains on his coat, he didn't hear as someone came in to the bathroom and say, "Not to kick you when you are down, Chazz, but you need to try not to make yourself look like an idiot in front of everyone." Chazz turned to see a Ra Yellow Coat and spoke harshly, "You don't know what I was doing, maybe I wanted to do that to myself."

The Ra Yellow responded, "Relax, Chazz, but I'm not trying to insult you. I actually want to help you. If you want to get their attention; beat them in a duel." The Ra Yellow then approached the nearby sink and then washed his hands and then added, "You've came close twice against them both before, so try and follow through before they clean sweep you..." Chazz wanted to yell at the Ra Yellow, but remained quiet as the gears of his mind were turning as the Ra Yellow dried his hands and approached the door, adding one last comment; "You don't need to thank me, but I know what you wanted to say. It's your choice, I'm just giving advice..."

Ojama Yellow then appeared, "Who is he to give the boss orders when it comes to dueling?" However, Chazz was thinking all about what the yellow said as class continued without him...
1211111111211111111.title: Possible Suitor Searching...

choices: What are Jasmine and Mindy up to?
12111111112111111111.content:
Around 16.30 lessons were over for the day. Once miss Fontaine dismissed her class, Alexis and Gledis streched their arms a bit and then they got out, while Mindy and Jasmine stayed in the classroom a little longer.

About five minutes later, Mindy and Jasmine exited the class

"So what are you girls up for next?" Alexis asked

"Well how about..." Gledis was about to say something but then she was interrupted by a loud noise

"ALEXIS, GLEDIS" two girls in obelisk blue uniforms, one with long black hairs and pale skin and the other with short blonde hair with a tanned skinned, arrived and once they were close enough they screamed " WE CHALLENGE YOU TO A DUEL"

"Oh great, Mandy and Brandy" Alexis said annoyed

"Yeah, the two most annoying girls in Obelisk Blue" Gledis confirmed

"So do you accept our challenge..." Mandy asked

"...or are you two just going to chicken out?" Brandy concluded

"You know Mindy, I always wondered how these two are able to be so synchronized without being blood related" Jasmine asked

"You know what they say, birds of a feather flocks together, or in this case I should say chickens of a feather, cluck together" Mindy responded causing a group laugh

"HOW DARE YOU INSULT US?" Brandy asked offended

"Easy Brandy" Alexis responded

"Yeah, don't ruffle your feathers" Gledis concluded, causing another round of laughs

"ENOUGH. DO YOU ACCEPT OUR DUEL?" Mandy asked

"Of course we do" Gledis responded

"We never back down from a challenge" Alexis finished "Let's go" and with that the six girls went into the obelisk blue arena

20 minutes later

"NNNNNNNNNNNNNOOOOOOOOOOOOO" Brandy screamed by falling on her knees

"NOT FAIR, NOT FAIR" Mandy screamed by stomping her foot on the ground.

It did not take long for Gledis and Alexis to defeat Brandy and Mandy, after only 3 rounds the duel was already over in a total victory for the twins

"Oh yeah" Alexis and Gledis said by high five and then they left the arena along Mindy and Jasmine, who were writting something on their palms
12111111112111111111.title: Later in the day, after class...

choices: Stay with Chazz as he makes it over to the Ra Yellow Dorm
Go back to Alexis and Gledis, heading to their dorm
121111111121111111112.content:
Chazz was on the upper level bleachers and was taking copious notes about the duel until Ojama Yellow appeared to interrupt his train of thought...

"Whatcha Doing, Boss?" Yellow asked innocently until he noticed the note-taking and spoke before Chazz answered, "Are you really gonna take someone else's advice just to beat Alexis?"

Chazz then his the notes and turned his full attention at Ojama Yellow, "Of course not! I'm just strategizing on how to beat Alexis or Gledis..."

Ojama Green then appeared to join in along with Obama Black; Black then spoke, "That Ra Yellow must've of gotten really under your skin if he is making you rethink all about your strategy on winning their hearts..."

Omaja Green then joined in, "He must have some nerve to question you, Boss..."

Chazz remained silent and thought about what the Ojamas said about his pride and how this one Ra Yellow was able to question himself and finally said, "You know what, you are right. That Ra Yellow had some nerve to question the Chazz! I can win Alexis and Gledis's hearts my way!"

Omaja Yellow then cheered, "That's the boss we know..."

With Chazz and his confidence of himself returned, he walked about the duel arena and began to walk out of the Duel Academy, going towards the Ra Yellow Dorm; ready to settle a score with the Ra Yellow who tried to change him....
121111111121111111112.title: Chazz was watching the duel

choices: Let's stay with Alexis, Gledis and Syrus
What are Jasmine and Mindy up to?
1211111111211111111122.content:
Mindy and Jasmine separated momentarly from Gledis and Alexis, so the two twin decided to take a long walk and finally return to their dorm.

"What do you think Mindy and Jasmine are up to Alexis?" Gledis asked

"Well knowing them they are probably ploting something with some guy in order to make him or them have a date with us" Alexis responded

"That or there is a sale at the market in the make up or bikini department" Gledis finished causing the two sisters to laugh.

After a good augh the two sisters decided to continue their walk. Along the way they heard someone calling them, they turned around and saw it was Syrus

"Hi Sy" Alexis greeted their friend

"What's up?" Gledis asked

"I just want to thank you for the help you gave me with the test the other day. If I passed it was all thanks to your help" Syrus said

"Oh don't mention it" Alexis said

"What are friends for after all" Gledis continued "Ehi how about a walk with us?"

"What? Are you sure? I mean you are the queens of the Duel Academy and to be seen with someone like me..." Syrus said but it was then stopped by Alexis

"Oh shut up with those nonsense. We are friends come on" Alexis said and so she put her arm around Syrus Neck, and the three of them continued walking
1211111111211111111122.title: Go back to Alexis and Gledis, heading to their ...

12111111112111111111222.content:
"Come out and show yourself. coward!" Chazz shouted as he stood in front of the Ra Yellow Dorm where Bastion stood in front of him, responding, "Chazz, what are screaming on about now?" Chazz was very quick to speak back in fury towards Bastion, "Someone from your dorm did something to me and I want to see him now..." A small crowd started to gather around the two until Bastion answered him with a question, "That raises more questions than answers, Chazz..."

Then a third voice entered the air as it came from behind the crowd and resonated from the stairs, "Come to attack me on my own doorstep, Chazz. Your pride must of been wounded more than I thought before." Chazz looked behind Bastion and saw a black somewhat spiked Ra Yellow with blue eyes with a sliver dragon necklace around his neck and a duel disk in hand as Chazz saw him speak directly towards him and Bastion, "Thank you for defending me, Bastion, but of Chazz wants to protect his pride and be unthankful for my advice, that's his business. But if he seeks a battle with me, then he shall have it. One of the best of Ra Yellow versus one of the few best of Slifer Red; I'm pretty sure he wouldn't want to displease this crowd that has gathered.

Chazz didn't know it, but he did walk into the Ra Yellow's trap; He actually wanted to duel him and teach him this way that his family pride was his main weakness and reason why he wouldn't be able to have either Daughter of the Rhodes Family's hand...
12111111112111111111222.title: Speak of the Devil, and He shall appear...

121111111121111111112222.content:
Alexis, Gledis and Syrus were walking through the beach, remembering all sort of funny moments that had happened during the year, especially the ones involving all the boys that tried flirting with the twins

"And then Chazz did a perfect face landing on the chocolate mousse" Gledis said while giggling

"Serve the Princeton right" Alexis commented causing a group laugh. However Syrus couldn't help himself and asked them a question

"Sorry girls but, just out of curiosity, aren't you two just a bit interest in romance?" Syrus asked

Alexis and Gledis looked at him and then answered "It's not that we are not. It's just that it is not our top priority right now" Alexis responded

"Besides, most of the guys here are really immature" Gledis commented

"Ah I see" Syrus said, but then he stopped seeing that the road was blocked by two big students of the Obelisk Blue dorm

"Why Hello Alexis, Gledis" One of them said

"How are you doing today?" The other one asked

"We were fine until a minute ago" Gledis commented in a low tone of voice

"Just what we needed, Jeff and Greg, the two biggest and dumbest bullies of the Accademy" Alexis commented

"How did these two managed to be in the Obelisk Blue dorm is beyond my comprehension" Gledis commented

"How very true" both Alexis and Syrus commented

"Oh look Jeff there appears to be an insect between them" Greg said making Syrus sweat

"Yeah I see it" Jeff said by preparing his fists

"Leave Syrus alone you jerks" Gledis said angrily

"Don't worry, we will leave him alone here" Jeff continued

"While we'll take you babes with us" Greg concluded not knowing that he has sealed their fates

"BABES?" Both Alexis and Gledis asked, causing Syrus to panic

"Are you talking about us?" Alexis asked angrily

"You called them babes" Syrus said to Jeff and Greg

"Are you talking about us?" Gledis asked angrily as well

"You shouldn't have done that" Syrus continued

"ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT US?" Alexis and Gledis both screamed

"Now you will get it" Syrus said by covering his eyes

2 minutes later both Jeff and Greg were on the ground with her faces red as tomatoes

"Don't you ever call us babes again, got it?" Both Alexis and Gledis said

"Yes ma'am" Jeff and Greg responded in a very low tone of voice, still confused for all the slapping they received

"Let's go Syr" Gledis told Syrus making him join the twins. Unknown to the twins, Jasmine and Mindy were watching the scene with another guy from the Ra Yellow dorm.

"We assure you Kevin, Alexis and Gledis are not always like this" Mindy said

"Yeah, they are just two girls that can defend themselves from jerks like Jeff and Greg" Jasmine continued but the guy named Kevin was smilling

"I like that in girls. I think I'm in love" Kevin commented
121111111121111111112222.title: Back with the Trio...

1211111111211111111122222.content:
Meanwhile, Chazz was doing poorly as he went up against the Ra Yellow Duelist that he was challenging. The Ra Yellow toyed with Chazz for the first few turns of the match, countering his every move and making him look like a fool; but even with hearing Chazz hurl insults towards him, he smirked gently and said only a few words outside of the duel himself. Bastion knew exactly what his fellow classmate was doing as he knew the tactic all to well as the duel was about to end quickly for Chazz.

"I'm done playing games, Kid, X-Head Cannon, blow that little monster of his away with Cannon Fire." The monster in front of X-Head Cannon was Decoy Dragon, a small little blue dragon that stared cutely at the mad Chazz in front of him."

The Ra Yellow's smirk then turned into a devilish grin and said, "I activate my Decoy Dragon's effect, once he is attacked; I can special summon a 7 or higher Dragon-Type Monster from my graveyard, and it shall become it's new attack target; and I shall choose Darkblaze Dragon..."

Chazz then responded, "Hey, News Flash; Your Darkblaze Dragon is still weaker than my X-Head Cannon." The Ra Yellow Student then butted in, "On the contrary, Chazz, you are mistaken; if Darkblaze Dragon is special summoned from the graveyard, his attack and defense doubles from his original, so my dragon won't be dying anytime soon..."

With that; Darkblaze Dragon fired a red fireball at X-Head Cannon's Cannon Fire and the crowd watched it make contact as Chazz went down from 2000 to 1400. The Ra Yellow added, "You played well, but your pride has ruined you; Once Darkblaze Dragon destroys a monster in battle, it deals damage equal to the number of attack points of the destroyed monster. Darkblaze, finish the job with Volcanic Fire Blast!"

Darkblaze Dragon charged up one more fireball towards Chazz and released it at him, sending his life points to zero; sending cheers on the Ra Yellow's side of supporters...

"Game..Set...Match; Come find me again when you are ready to accept my teachings..." The Ra Yellow said as he walked back towards the door without even looking at the defeated Chazz as he gripped the grass with anger...
1211111111211111111122222.title: Dancing with the Devil never bodes well...

choices: Let' go to the blue dorm
Let's go to the yellow dorm
12111111112111111111222221.content:
While Chazz was suffering for his defeat, Alexis, Gledis and Syrus were walking back to their dorms, with the twins still on a very high note for the events of a while ago

"Ah nothing like teaching some manners to a couple of jerks" Alexis exclaimed

"Yep, that sure was a great way to kill some stress" Gledis commented

"Yeah well, You sure can be very scary in some circustances" Syrus pointed out

"Ehi we hate being called like that" Gledis responded

"It sounds like there is only the body in us, and not the brain, like we are some bimbos" Alexis finished

"Yeah like Jeff and Greg are anyone to talk about brains" Syrus commented causing a group laugh. After a while Syrus heard his PDA bipping, sound that a message has arrived. He took it and read it

"Anything exciting?" Alexis asked

"You bet" Syrus said while grinning

"What is it?" Gledis asked curious

"It seems that our dear Chazz has received his second dose of humiliation for the day by one of my dorm." Syrus explained

"Really? Finally there is someone else who is standing up to the jerks of this school?" Gledis asked happily

"It's about time. Whoever your friend is must have some guts" Alexis commented. At that point Syrus noticed that they were arrived at the crossroad to the blue and yellow dorms

"Well I better go. Thanks for the company girls" Syrus said to the twins

"Thank you Syrus always a pleasure" Gledis saluted her friend and continued "Have a nice afternoon"

"Yeah, and give our compliments to your friend" Alexis finished

It will be done" Syrus said and with that the trio separated
12111111112111111111222221.title: With the Trio...

choices: Let's stay with Alexis, Gledis, Amy and Lita
121111111121111111112222211.content:
After a few minutes of walking, Alexis and Gledis arrived at the blue dorm

"So what should we do now sis?" Alexis asked

"How about going to the cafeteria and drink something?" Gledis proposed

"Good idea. Let's go" Alexis said and with that the two sisters went for the cafeteria. They were almost there when they heard somebody calling their names. They turned around and saw

"Amy. Lita" Gledis said happily

"How are you doing girls?" Alexis asked at her two friends once they reached them

"Pretty good. Amy here got another 3 perfect scores in three of those extra-curriculum tests she always takes" Lita said

"While Lita had 10 victories in a road both in dueling and in karate fights in the last few days" Amy continued

"Wow, you two sure had a busy day" Gledis said

"Well, I'm sure not as busy as yours your highness" Lita said by bowing down to the twins

"Stop calling us like that please" Alexis said

"Sure your highness" Amy responded by bowing as well causing a group laugh. Then Gledis asked

"Say, we were about to go to the cafeteria and drink something. Would you like to come with us?"

"With pleasure" Amy said

"Thank you" Lita said

"Okay let's go" Alexis said and with that the 4 girls started walking

30 minutes later

"So besides the usual lessons you two gave Chazz his just dessert, put Brandy and Mandy in their place and taught Jeff and Greg a lesson in manners?" Amy asked with an orange juice in her hand

"Pretty much" Alexis said while drinking her tea

"You sure had one busy day today" Lita commented while drinking her energetic drink

"You can say that again" Gledis confirmed while enjoying her tea as well.
121111111121111111112222211.title: Let' go to the blue dorm

choices: Jasmine and Mindy join the group
Let's go to the yellow dorm
1211111111211111111122222111.content:
“Now that I think about it, it’s going to be spring break soon” Amy asked.

“Yeah you right. Do you guys have anything special planned?” Gledis continued

“Not really. How about we organize something together?” Lita proposed

“That’s a great idea. We should create a group and go somewhere all together” Alexis continued

“Great idea sis. I personally would like to propose a trip to the Aychiri mountains next to Domino city” Gledis proposed

“That’s an excellent idea Gledis. There are plenty of great places to relax and have some fun over there and also I know a very fancy place where we can sleep” Lita suggested

“I like this idea as well” Amy commented

“Me too, I just hope that this place is nothing to luxurious and expensive” Alexis commented

“You don’t have to worry about that Alexis. Although the hotel is a bit luxurious is owned by my family, so you can be sure that it will be receiving a good discount” Lita responded

“Lita, we appreciate but we do not want to disturb” Alexis reacted

“Yes I agree” Gledis confirmed but Lita just waved her hand and said “Don’t be silly girls, my family is only happy if we go and visit, and besides a few great duelists of the new generation like you two, will only attract more clients” Lita explained

“Now that I think about it, isn’t that hotel the one that hosts that big duel monster tournament” Amy asked

“Yep, so we could both have some relax and enjoy some duels with new rivals” Lita said

“It sounds almost too good to be true” Gledis commented while daydreaming the vacation

“Yeah” Alexis confirmed with a big smile on her face

“So do we have a winner?” Lita asked

“YES” Amy, Alexis and Gledis said all together

“Perfect. Now let’s discuss a few details for this trip” Lita said and with that the girls began ploting
1211111111211111111122222111.title: Let's stay with Alexis, Gledis, Amy and Lita

12111111112111111111222221112.content:
Syrus had made his way back towards the Ra Yellow Dorm, seeing a few people around the outside of the dorm, but noticing a fellow Ra Yellow sitting on by the stairs, shuffling his deck as he looked towards the sea, knowing that he was going to have to speak to Chazz about the whole exchange today sooner or later as Syrus approached him, breaking that chain of thought for a moment as his focus shifted towards Syrus.

"Evening, Syrus." He spoke as he looked up at him, showing a smirk as he had some amount of an idea of where he was and added, "You just missed Chazz stomping off after his defeat against me." Syrus however then asked, "Oh geez, who provoked who, Adam?" Adam then dropped his smirk and then explained, "Other than me attempting him to give advice, he would probably say I would of provoked him." Syrus just sighed and sat next to Adam, "Chazz has had it rough since he got back here at the academy, but I would recommend not angering him."

Adam wanted to help people but he usually had a rough time with people who didn't really understand him, hence why he usually talked to people that knew him rather than talking to people who didn't, but in Chazz's case; he did egg him on and felt somewhat mad at himself for doing it, but had to do it to teach him a lesson on humility, however, that also seemed to somewhat backfire on him and finally spoke to Syrus, relaxing as he placed his deck back in a small box. "Well, all I wanted to do is help him and give him advice, he is the one who took it as an offense. But we shall see, Syrus, if Chazz wants to come back and come after me again. In the meantime, I better get some study time in before dinner." And with that, Adam went into the dorm, leaving Syrus to look at the beginning of the sunset.
12111111112111111111222221112.title: Syrus and the Dragon

121111111121111111112222211121.content:
Alexis and Gledis ,as soon as they finished discussing the details for their spring break vacation with Amy and Lita, keeping it open that any possible change could happen, decided to take a little walk around the blue dorms.

“So sis. Since we are all in the middle of holiday speaking tomorrow is Friday, do you want us to do something special for the weekend, or just kick back and relax?” Gledis proposed Alexis.

“Well, I’m not sure, there are no particular events programmed for this weekend at the Academy” Alexis said and then continued “But still, just sit back and do nothing can be pretty boring".

“That’s true “Gledis confirmed “How about we do a little bit of both? Maybe we can organize a day at the beach, that way will both have relax and fun” Gledis propose di.

“That’s a great idea sis” Alexis approved “Let’s go gather up some of the girls and organize it”.

“You bet sis” Gledis responded and with that the two sisters highfived and started running back to their dorm.

Unknown to them, somebody eavesdropped their conversation. It was
121111111121111111112222211121.title: With Gladis and Alexis

1211111111211111111122222111213.content: Could it be some of the jerks they met earlier today?

Let's follow Chazz or the bullies
121111111121111111112222211121331.content:
Hidden behind a bush, Mandy and Brandy have eavesdropped the entire conversation between the twins. Once Alexis and Gledis have left the area, they started to talk.

“Did you hear that? A day at the beach?” Mandy grinned.

“Loud and clear. It’s the perfect chance to get some payback on those two bitches” Brandy grinned as well.

“Well said” Mandy approved and then continued “Come on, we have a lot of work to do”.

“Yeah” Brandy said and with that the two girls ran back to their room.


2 minutes earlier behind a big rock:

Jeff and Greg have eavesdropped the entire conversation between the twins. Once Alexis and Gledis have left the area, they started to talk.

“Did you hear that? A day at the beach?” Jeff grinned.

“You bet I heard them. It’s the perfect chance to teach those two babes to respect us” Greg grinned as well.

“Well said” Jeff approved and then continued “Come on, we have to prepare ourselves".

“Yeah” Jaff said and with that the two bullies ran back to their room.


2 minutes earlier behind a tree:

Chazz has eavesdropped the entire conversation between Alexis and Gledis. Once the twins have left the area, he started to think.

“A day at the beach? That’s perfect. It’s the chance I’ve been waiting to impress Alexis and Gledis” Chazz thought. Then suddenly the Ojama trio appeared from Chazz’s deck.

“You have to be very careful Boss” Ojama Yellow said while landing on Chazz’s shoulder.

“You have to come up with a full prove plan” Ojama Black continued.

“If you really want to impress them” Oyama Green finished.

“You guys are right” Chazz said while putting on his thinking face “I better get back to my room and start preparing my moves” Chazz finished and with that he walked away.


2 minutes earlier on a hill not far from where Alexis and Gledis were talking:

“Did you hear them Kevin? This is your chance” Mindy happily said.

“She is right. At the beach you could easily impressed them” Jasmine continued.

“We’ll see. Besides I fell kind bad for eavesdropping their conversation, almost like a stalker” Kevin replied.

“Oh don’t be ridiculous, you were just chatting with us, which just happened to be near Gledis and Alexis” Mindy said.

“Seriously?" Kevin asked with an expression that did not hide his amusement.

“Yeah. Now go home and prepare yourself, the weekend is right behind the corner after all” Jasmine said.

“Ok ok. Bye girls and Thank you” Kevin said while leaving the area.

“You are welcome Kevin” Both Jasmine and Mindy said while waving their hands.
121111111121111111112222211121331.title: Yes

1211111111211111111122222111213311.content:
After separating from Kevin, Jasmine and Mindy reached Alexis and Gledis.

"Ehi girls" both Jasmine and Mindy called the twins.

"Oh look who's here" Gledis said.

"Our two boys hunters" Alexis finished, causing a group laugh.

"Yeah, well we hunted enough for one day" Mindy said still laughing.

"Now we just want to relax and chat with our friends" Jasmine said.

"Really?" Both Alexis and Gledis asked suspiciously.

"Yes really" Jasmine said.

"We were wondering on what to do this weekend" Mindy said.

"Well we thought of something." Alexis said.

"How does a day at the beach sound?" Gledis asked.

"TERRYFIC" Mindy and Jasmine said together.

"Then let's go organizing" Alexis said.

"Well said sis" Gledis finished, and with that the four girls hurried back to the blue dorm.
