12111111112111111111222221112133112.title: At the yellow dorm

choices: The Truth of Where He Was
Make something up and keep them out of the loop
121111111121111111112222211121331121.content:
Adam and Syrus were nearby the dorm steps, testing their decks on each other on a nearby picnic table when Kevin walked up. Syrus noticed him first as they were both putting their decks away and spoke out to Kevin, "Hey Kevin, where have you been?"

Kevin looked towards both Syrus and Adam and wondered if he should tell them about the meeting with Mindy and Jasmine. Adam was one to keep secrets and would be an excellent candidate to pass along the information, but Syrus was a close friend of Gledis Rhodes and was her "little brother, " making him feel unsure to mention why he was appearing so late in the afternoon, where he was, or who he was with. After a brief moment of thought, Kevin then said to his fellow Ra Yellows...
121111111121111111112222211121331121.title: Adam and Syrus

1211111111211111111122222111213311211.content:
Kevin decided that he could trust both Syrus and Adam with what happened earlier.

“Well guys, let’s just say that Jasmine and Mindy have found a way to keep me occupied this afternoon” Kevin responded.

“Jasmine and Mindy? You mean Alexis and Gledis friends” Adam asked curious.

“Yep.” Kevin said.

“Wait. Are you saying that they tried to…” Syrus asked

“…introduce me to the wonder twins? Yep once again” Kevin answered.

Both Adam and Syrus were shocked “And what do you think of them?” Syrus asked at some point.

“Got to admit. They are really amazing girls” Kevin responded “Really unique”.

“Yeah, that’s true” Adam added without even realizing what he just said.

That got Kevin and Syrus’s attention “YOU TOO ADAM?” Kevin and Syrus asked surprised. Adam turned a bit red, but then with all the courage he had, he nodded.

“Well, welcome to the club” Kevin said by shaking Adam’s hand.

“Thanks. Although, I have a complain. I never received my membership card” Adam said causing a group laugh. Once they stopped Adam and Kevin turned to Syrus and asked him.

“What about you Sy?” “Are you a member as well?” Adam and Kevin asked.

“No, it’s true that I like them, but I consider them just my friends. But let me tell you: I knew them for a while now, and I think that you two will score high in their book” Syrus said while putting his hands on Adam and Kevin’s back.

“Thanks Sy, that means a lot from you” Adam responded.

“You just have to wait for the right occasion” Syrus said.

“Well that might be sooner than we think. Jasmine and Mindy told me that the girls are planning a day at the beach this weekend” Kevin added.

“Really?” Adam and Syrus asked.

“Yep.” Kevin responded.

“Well do you guys have made plans for the weekend?” Syrus asked joking.

Adam and Kevin looked at each other’s and then said “ We have now” causing another group laugh.
1211111111211111111122222111213311211.title: The Truth of Where He Was

choices: Back at the Ra Yellow Dorm
12111111112111111111222221112133112111.content:
Back at the Obelisk Dorms, each pair was getting ready for the weekend, as best they could, but only Alexis and Gledis were the ones really getting ready for their weeked at the small little beach that was nearby the Blue Dorms. However, Alexis and Gledis didn't expect how many people knew about their little plans.

Mindy and Jasmine were also getting ready in the their room, laughing and smiling about what they had been able to accomplish by finding a possible suitor for either Alexis or Gledis. Mindy would later get a message from Kevin, at least filling them in that he might have a friend joining him to the beach.

However, Mandy and Brandy were planning on how exactly to get payback on Alexis and Gledis, still boiling with anger after being defeated. They were both editting and tweaking their decks slightly to a point they believed was necessary.

Meanwhile, at the Boy's Dorm, Jeff and Greg were preparing for the weekend, planning on gaining the attention of the "Rhodes Babes" and getting ready in case their plans went south.

The weekend slowly crept forward as the sun began to sink behind the ocean, giving everyone only a few more hours of sunlight before the day would be done for everyone.
12111111112111111111222221112133112111.title: Back to the blue dorm

choices: On their way to the beach
121111111121111111112222211121331121112.content:
It was around 7 a.m. in the morning when Alexis and Gledis woke up and decided to go do breakfast, knowing full well that on a weekend it was rare to see somebody in the dining hall. And in fact they had the place all for themselves, except that in a matter of minutes Amy and Lita arrived as well.

The four girls decided to have breakfast all together, and after having their share taken, they started eating and chatting on how they were going to spend the rest of the day, and since neither Amy or Lita had anything particular planned for the weekend, Alexis and Gledis invited them to the beach. Amy and Lita did not waste any time in accepting an invitation from their friends, and so they started discuss on what they were going to do at the beach, when Mindy and Jasmine arrived.

The two new girls wasted no time in joining the crew and add their own ideas, but the girls did not mind, especially because they know that adding J&M would only make the day a lot more fun. Around 8 a.m. the dining hall was starting to fill and so the group decided it was time toleave and prepare themselves for their beach day.
121111111121111111112222211121331121112.title: The Beginning of the Weekend

choices: The Six Girls make it to the Beach
Someone else makes it to the Beach first
1211111111211111111122222111213311211121.content:
WhIle the six Obelisk Girls were on their way to the Beach, Mandy and Brandy were eating breakfast and working on last minute edit's as they were determined to make sure that they won against Alexis and Gledis.

Chazz was making his way across the island, trying not to pass the Ra Yellow Dorm as best he could, still remembering his defeat and was still holding a grudge towards Adam for trying to change the Chazz.

Jeff and Greg were taking the slow route and was eating their breakfast in their dorm, not really rushing as they were in no hurry to impress their babes in waiting as they had prepared everything last night.

Kevin and Adam were also preparing themselves for the long Beach day, however, Kevin seemed slightly more nervous than Adam was as he prepared for the day before they went and got breakfast in their dorm. Adam was slightly more interested in seeing new people rather than scouting for a relationship, but he also wanted to help Kevin as a wingman today in case something would go wrong...
1211111111211111111122222111213311211121.title: On their way to the beach

1211111111211111111122222111213311211121.content:
It was really a girls parade the one that arrived at Academy beach that morning. As soon as they arrived the girls decided where to park all their staff, and thanks to the fact that they arrived early, they took the best spot under. Amy and Lita started to prepare the beach chairs, Alexis and Gledis prepared the pic-nic zone, while Jasmine and Mindy started to prepare the games and the sun creams.

“MMMhhhh, what a beautiful day” Mindy commented.

“Perfect for staying at the beach” Jasmine said.

“You two” Alexis called.

“Quit daydreaming and come over here and help” Gledis finished.

“Coming” Mindy and Jasmine responded by joining the others.

About 30 minutes later, all 6 girls were now in their bikinis, on their beach chairs with the sunglasses on and enjoying their day.

“AAAaaaaahhhhhhh, this is paradise” All six girls said together.
1211111111211111111122222111213311211121.title: The Six Girls make it to the Beach

choices: Around Noon, Mandy and Brandy appear at the beach
Around Noon, Jeff, Greg, Mandy, and Brandy appear at the beach
1211111111211111111122222111213311211121.content:
Hours when by as the morning sun rose over the Duel Academy, giving the Six Obelisk Girls some much needed peace and quiet, but Mindy and Jasmine knew that it wouldn't be much longer until Kevin and Adam would appear, not knowing who else who would be either following after them or coming before them...

Mandy and Brandy were the closest to the beach, but they decided to take their time as to have the element of surprise on the Obelisk Girls, wanting to really surprise them and challenge Alexis and Gledis for revenge of their previous loss.

Jeff and Greg was behind Mandy and Brandy, noticing they were also heading for the beach that Alexis and her group went to, thinking that they were going to have a mass audience of "babes" to see how they were going to steal Alexis and Gladis's hearts.

Chazz, Kevin and Adam were heading towards the beach and were the farthest away from the beach, not meeting on the way towards the Obelisk dorms, but Chazz caught a few peeks of their yellow jackets as he made his way through the forest, making sure he wasn't spotted by them, thinking that he might of saw Adam as well.
1211111111211111111122222111213311211121.title: Some peace time is necessary

1211111111211111111122222111213311211121.content:
The six girls were enjoying their beach day: after doing some sunbathing, they did a beach volley match 3 against 3, a little bit of reading, at least for Amy, Gledis and Alexis, and also a swim in the ocean.

Around noon.

“Mmmmmmhhh this is the life” Mindy said while stretching her arms.

“Yeah, but you know I’m starting to feel a bit hungry” Lita commented.

“Well it’s almost lunch time” Alexis noticed.

“So why don’t we prepare for lunch?” Gledis proposed.

“Agreed” Everybody else said.

After no more than five minutes the girls have spread on the beach a big cloth, taken out of their bags all the foods and drinks and also disposed the dishes and cutlery. With that they sat on the beach and prepare themselves to eat when suddenly Lita noticed something.

“Ah girls, I think we have company” Lita said, and the girls wondered what she meant since they did not noticed anything.

“What are you talking about Lita?” Amy asked her friend.

“I’m pretty sure I saw Mandy and Brandy hiding behind a bush” Lita said.

“WHAT?” Alexis and Gledis asked annoyed “ Not them again”.

“Are you sure Lita” Jasmine asked.

“Positively. Behind those bushes” Lita said by pointing with her face in a particular beach area were there were two big bushes. The other girls looked in that direction, secretly, and noticed Mandy and Brandy.

“Great. Just what we need to ruin our day” Amy said annoyed, while Alexis and Gledis looked at each other’s and nodded in agreement.

“Our day is not ruined” Gledis started

“In fact we could make it even a bit more fun” Alexis concluded leaving the other four girls with puzzled looks. Alexis then continued “Come closer and I’ll explain” and with that the six girls started conspirate.
1211111111211111111122222111213311211121.title: Around Noon, Mandy and Brandy appear at the beach

1211111111211111111122222111213311211121.content:
Jeff and Greg were about a few minutes from the beach, right behind Mandy and Brandy, neither group knowing that more people were also coming. However, about a mile and a half back, Kevin and Adam were in the middle of confrontation after they spotted Chazz as he made it to the road, thinking he was in the clear of Ra Yellows.

Chazz was livid when he saw Adam, but Adam had no response for Chazz, letting him yell mindlessly at him as Kevin backed away from the confrontation, letting them work it out.

After Chazz was done shouting about how Adam couldn't change the Chazz and showing his Princeton Pride by standing up for himself when facing a rival, Adam just smirked and remained calm, answering back, "Chazz, I didn't plan on changing you. That's not what I do, only you can make those decisions. All I did was tell you my thoughts about the situation and you choose to be against my opinion. Sooner or later, Chazz, you are going to realize that your actions will have consequences."

"Bah. You know nothing of the Chazz. I will become the great duelist and none of you lower level dweebs will stop me," Chazz then stomped away from Adam and continued making his way towards the beach where Alexis and Gledis's party was while Kevin and Adam took a moment to rest and relax for Lunch that they had packed in case the walk took longer than expected.
1211111111211111111122222111213311211121.title: Meanwhile the others

choices: The other groups are watching from a distance
One of the group arrives at the beach
1211111111211111111122222111213311211121.content:
After about 10 minutes since they have arrived at the beach, Mandy and Brandy were still hiding behind the bushes organizing with the two buckets they brought with them.

“Okay is everything ready?” Mandy asked while grinning.

“It sure is” Brandy confirmed while grinning as well.

“Perfect” Mandy responded with an evil smile on her face.

Unknown to the two girls, Amy was looking at them with a small binoculars she had brought with her, while Alexis and Gledis were covering her.

“It seems they have two buckets with them both full of molasses” Amy whispered “And considering that around the beach there are few spots where students stay during beautiful days like these, including the beach bar, it’s pretty much obvious what their plan is” Amy said.

“Covering us with that stuff, and making sure we look like fools in front of all the other students” Lita said “Childish, besides we are at the seaside, we could always wash away that stuff, maybe not all but most of it”.

“Childish and stupid” Mindy said.

“Agreed” Jasmine confirmed.

“Well, let’s make sure they realize who is really stupid here” Alexis said.

“Well said sis. Let’s go” Gledis said and with that the six girls split in three groups. Amy and Lita went quickly to the beach bar, Jasmine and Mindy took a bucket and started filling it with sea water, while Alexis and Gledis acted as bait in the center of the beach.

At the bar, Amy and Lita took a few bottles of cold sodas and a bucket full of ice. With those, they hurried back at the beach but this time they took a different route and hided themselves behind Mandy and Brandy.

Jasmine and Mindy instead took the bucket of sea water back to their spot and along with the Twins started to mix all their sun screams with the water creating a very viscous substrance, while acting as baits as well

Meanwhile Mandy and Brandy, too focused on their plan, did not noticed the movements of their targets. So when they turned their attention back to the group, they noticed a few changes, but that did not scared them.

“Shall we?” Brandy asked.

“As soon as the other two returns” Mandy suggested, with Brandy nodding.

They had no idea that Amy and Lita were right behind them.
1211111111211111111122222111213311211121.title: Back at the Beach

1211111111211111111122222111213311211121.content:
Mandy and Brandy decided that it was time for them to start their plan, so they took their two buckets in their hands and prepared for the moment to strike.

Unfortunately for them, Lita and Amy were right behind them and preparing their counterstrike. Quietly they approached Mandy and Brandy, took advantage of the fact that those two were practically stuck, they act.

While Lita took the back of Mandy and Brandy’s shorts, Amy poured down the ice on the girls’ backs. The reaction was instantaneous.

“Ggggyyyaaaa” Mandy screamed

“Cold,cold, cold” Brandy shouted as well.

Both of the girls, got out from the bushes screaming and dancing like monkeys, and in all their crazy moving around they throw their buckets full of molasses in the air, which landed back on the girls heads after covering them with the molasses.

“What the…” Mandy and Brandy screamed. The buckets got in fact stuck in their hands blocking completely their views. With all their spinning the two girls covered in molasses in the end fell on the beach, close to the rest of the gang and covered themselves with sand as well.

From their spot, Alexis, Gledis, Jasmine and Mindy decided to act. They quickly throw their special lotion on Mandy and Brandy covering them with that stuff. As a strange reaction with the molasses, the lotion caused an itchy reaction on the two girls, causing them to move even more like monkeys.

The show Mandy and Brandy created, caused a large group of people to come and see “the dancing monkey duo with a bucket on their heads” as Jasmine and Mindy called them. In a matter of seconds the beach was full of laughs. Mandy and Brandy, even though they had their heads covered with the buckets, left with a lot of difficulty and embarrassment, the beach under the laughs of hundreds of students.

A couple of minutes later, Amy and Lita joined the gang and, between the laughs, they opened their bottles of sodas.

“Cheers to friendship” Amy and Lita said

“To justice” Alexis and Gledis added

“And also a bit of vengeance” Jasmine and Mandy added, causing another round of laugh. And with that, the six girls enjoyed their drinks.
1211111111211111111122222111213311211121.title: Show time

1211111111211111111122222111213311211121.content: Someone watched the entire episode. Who?
1211111111211111111122222111213311211121.title: In the audience someone ....

1211111111211111111122222111213311211121.content:
Mixed in the crowd Kevin, Adam and a recently arrived Syrus were watching the girls.

“Wow, that was some serious scheming” Kevin said.

“It sure was” Adam confirmed.

“What happened exactly guys? I only saw what it looked like Mandy and Brandy leaving the beach in a …. How should I put it?” Syrus asked wondering what happened. Adam and Kevin then took their friend apart and started explaining to him the owl event.

“Wow, I’m both a bit sorry I missed it, and also I feel a bit sorry for Mandy and Brandy” Syrus said.

“Seriously?” Kevin and Adam asked surprised by Syrus’s compassion.

“Not really” Syrus said while grinning, which caused the trio to laugh

“So what do you say guys? Shall we try our luck with the magnificent six” Kevin proposed.

“Maybe not now Kev. After this satisfaction I believe those girls will want some alone time” Adam suggested.

Kevin thought about that, and then responded “You right Adam, let’s head to the bar and have a snack. After that we’ll give it a shoot. Coming Syr?”.

Syrus felt a bit uneasy and then responded “Thank you guys, but I do not think I should come with you”.

“Oh come on Syr. Why not?” Kevin asked.

“Yeah Syr come with us” Adam joined the conversation.

“Well I I…” Syrus tried to say something but he was slowly turning red while looking in the direction of the girls. Curious Adam looked in the same direction, and he noticed that Syrus was looking at one of the girls in particular. Then he understood.

“I get it now Kevin. Our Syrus has a crush on Amy” Adam explained.

“Wwwhhhhhaaaatttttt?” Syrus asked, now redder than ever.

“Really Syr?” Kevin asked surprised.

“Nnnoo nnnooo. That is not true.” Syrus tried to say while shaking like crazy, but Adam and Kevin understood that it was all true.

“Come on man, don’t be shy. You are among friends” Adam said by putting a hand on Syrus shoulder.

“Yeah, besides let me tell you. You got great tastes in women” Kevin said jokingly.

“Thanks, but I am no man” Syrus said feeling a bit down.

“Oh Syrus please. Don’t tell us that” Adam said.

“Yeah, besides now it is official. After a snack, to bust our strengths, the three musketeers will charge the magnificent six” Kevin said still joking.

“What? But guys…” Syrus said while bluhing.

“You cannot escape Syrus. You know the say: All for one…” Adam started.

“…and one for all.” Kevin concluded and with that they both grabbed Syrus who, still a little bit embarrassed, went with his friends at the beach bar.
1211111111211111111122222111213311211121.title: The three musketeers

1211111111211111111122222111213311211121.content:
“ A toast to us” Jasmine and Mindy proposed, and with that all six girls raised their soda bottles and enjoyed their drinks.

“Mmmhhh, nothing like a good drink after giving some bullies their just dessert” Lita commented.

“You said that Lita” Gledis approuved.

“Still, don’t you girls think we went a little bit overboard?” Amy asked a bit concerned.

“Not when it comes to Mandy and Brandy Amy” Alexis responded “Those two needed that lesson”.

“It’s nice for you to be concerned Amy, but we did not do anything drastic” Gledis continued.

“I agree. We just gave them a taste of their own medicine” Lita confirmed.

“Perhaps you are right girls. With some people, words alone are not enough” Ami concluded, and with that the six girls finished their drinks.

“All right, now who is up for a little R&R?” Jasmine proposed.

“Me” All the girls answered, and with that they all laid down on the beach, some resting, some reading and some listening to the music, in the early afternoon sun.
1211111111211111111122222111213311211121.title: Back with the girls

1211111111211111111122222111213311211121.content:
While the girls started their R&R, Chazz had just arrived at the beach.

"All right. Now where are those two beatifu?....Wwooowww" Chazz said while noticing the six girls all together "It is official. I just hit the jackpot" Chazz commented.

After that Chazz went directly to the girls "Good afternoon Ladies. The Chazz has arrived".

"Oh great" Alexis commented with annoyance in her voice.

"Another troublemaker" Gledis commented with the same annoyance in her voice.

What will happen next?
1211111111211111111122222111213311211121.title: Chazz arrives at the beach

choices: Jeff and Greg approached the gang

Near the beach, Jeff and Greg were approaching the area where the girls were relaxing.

As soon as they arrived at the beach they looked for the girls, and after taking off their shirts, they found them.

"Ehi Jeff look. 6 babes right over ther" Greg said by pointing at the gang

"Yeah Greg, but it seems to be an annoying extra too". Jeff commented.
1211111111211111111122222111213311211121.title: Meanwhile somewhere else

1211111111211111111122222111213311211121.content:
Syrus was finishing his drink, when he noticed what was happening with the girls.

“Ehi guys look” Syrus said to Adam and Kevin while pointing at the beach, where Jeff and Greg were walking.

“Oh come on. Even Jeff and Greg now?” Adam said annoyed, noticing that the 2 bullies were headed to the girls.

“Apparently, today is not a good day for the ladies” Kevin said.

“Do you guys think we should do something?” Syrus asked “I mean, I know those girls can defend themselves but still…”

“Yeah I know what do you mean Syr…” Adam confirmed with a concern look on his face

“Me too” Kevin concluded.

What will the guys do?
1211111111211111111122222111213311211121.title: Meanwhile Syrus, Adam and Kevin

1211111111211111111122222111213311211121.content:
"Come on ladies, don't you want to hang up with the Chazz?" Chazz asked by sitting between Alexis and Gledis again.

The two twins were very annoyed by Chazz presence, and by looking at their friends they begged them to help figure out a way to get rid of him.

Gledis then noticed that Jeff and Greg were about a minute walking from them. She pointed that with the eyes to Alexis, who as soon as her twin ponted at them, she saw them too. Then the two twins pointed the two bullies to the other four girls.

Amy then had an idea who she whispered to Lita, and together they explained it to all the other girls.Chazz noticed this

Meanwhile in the Ra Yellow Dorm...

Adam was in the Ra Yellow Dorm, eating dinner with a few of his friends, and mainly being the quiet one as Syrus and Bastion had a mild conversation nearby as he saw a few of the other familiar faces in the Ra Yellow Dorm. Brier and Beauregard were sitting at a different table, planning something as they always did. Adam just continued to eat before Tyranno Hassleberry sat right next to him, "Howdy, Captain, I heard that you gave Chazz a nice whooping earlier." Adam just smiled as he looked at him, "Evening, Hassleberry...Yea, Chazz's pride got the better of him, but I figured that he would have heeded my earlier advice to his situation." Syrus then noticed Adam talking about Chazz and then added, "He was trying to give Chazz dating advice on Jane and Alexis." Adam then responded back to Syrus, "Well, you can't really say my advice isn't fully correct, Syrus. Not many have beaten either one of them and ones who does have their respect. It would have raised his stock in their eyes if they didn't already hate his guts." Bastion then joined in the conversation by adding, "You say that as if you know them..." Adam was quiet for a second and then answered, "Well, my family is very well-connected. However, like Hassleberry, I didn't take part in associated prep school, unlike the Rhodes family. I could have been easily accepted into any prep school around the world, but my family wanted me to focus on close family affairs before coming here."

Tyranno looked at Adam as he listened to him, "You never really like telling details, do you?" Adam sighed and spoke to the three guys around him, "In the past, people tried to use me to get to the people my father are close to, so yeah, high school was a nightmare. But I'll let you know in time who my family is connected with. But be warned, It will show a lot more about me than you guys probably wanted to know." With that, he got up and took his plate towards the kitchen, ending the conversation right then and there.

She gave Chazz the new name of Christina and started working on her past and memories. She was born as an only child in the slums, she lived with only her mother because her father was a constant drunk, causing her to be scared at the time. She fell for dueling at the age of seven when her mother got her a basic starter deck and gained a major interest in Fairy-type monster as they reminded her of stories her mother told her. When she was eleven, her mother got into a car crash and after that, she couldn't walk anymore. My guess is that accident caused her to become incredibly timid and not being able to show her true feeling around others, and in a weird way, it also caused her to become extremely clumsy. At the age of twelve she learned that her father had passed away from a drunk driving accident, and strangely her mother's condition worsened, and she was no longer capable of taking care of her, so she was adopted by her mother's boss. "The Princeton family". Never being treated like a real member of the family, unlike the sons and daughters of Princeton name, who adapted the ideas to occupy the best or most important positions in the world, which Christina slowly adopted as well.

It was about a month before she arrived at the Duel Academy, when we were invited at one of their fancy parties, we saw Christina speak to her step sisters Nina and Dina, and with their disgusting voices and laughed as they were making fun of her, and then Christina swore to them that she was going to be the best here at the Academy, no matter what. Nina and Dina laughed at her, but they accepted the deal that if she was able to accomplish that, then the entire Princeton family would start to respect her. She barely made it into the Duel Academy and was accepted as a Slifer Red, but began to challenge many Obelisk Blues to show that she could gain the respect of her adopted family, trying to get the attention to be moved up out of Slifer Red Dorms.

After that, The Spirit carried Christina back to her dorm and then changed her clothes, room, and items, making sure that every detail was changed about the former Chazz Princeton...

Chazz,

I challenge you to a duel and if you win, I'll be your girlfriend! Meet me at the cave under the Slifer Dorm at midnight tonight!

From Alexis Rhodes.

"Now that that's done," Alexis took out a piece of paper. "Time to write out Chazz's new female identity to give to the spirit." She had planned out some of the things as she wrote them down with her own commentary.

-

Chazz's new identity

Name: Christina Prince

"Has to have cute name."

Gender: Female

"Of course she would be female."

Appearance: Heart shaped face, silky black/silver hair down to her back, red/gray eyes, pale complexion, D-Cup breast and womanly body.

"Gotta make her at least attractive looking."

Personality: Shy and timid, and also clumsy

"Making her the opposite of Chazz's is a good idea, and the clumsy part will gave her a nice touch for the laughs."

Academy Rank: Slifer Red

"Some sweet irony."

Deck Type: Fairy

"It'll be more interesting to say the least."

Biography: Born an only child in the slums, she lived with only her mother because her father was a constant drunk, causing her to be scared at time. She fell for dueling at the age of seven when her mother got her a basic starter deck and gained a major interest in Fairy type monster as they reminded her of stories her mother told her. When she was eleven, her mother got into a car crash and after that she couldn't walk anymore. This caused her to become incredibly timid and not being able to show her true feeling around others, and in a weird way, it also caused her to become extremly clumsy. At the age of twelve she learned that her father had passed away from a drunk driving accident. She decided to keep her mother's last name as Prince as spent most of her time practicing her dueling skill where at the foster home, she became known as 'The Foster's Fairy', the best duelist there. Soon at the age of fourteen, she heard about Duel Academy and went to sign up for it. She learned that there were much stronger duelist and barely made it,also because of her clumsiness, putting her in the Slifer Red Dorm, . She eventually became friends with Syrus, Chummy, Alexis, Jane, Bastion, Mindy, Jasmine and many others. She secretly has a crush on Bastion, but can't show it.

"There we go, that should work well."

-

Get ready and start the day
1211111112211121121111122112211211211112.content:
Christina was deep in slumber as she rested in her bed, entering a world of comfort or nightmares, her dreams....

Christina saw that she was very elegantly dressed up, in a white dress that made her look gorgeous and absolutely stunning. She was standing in front of a mirror and took her time to analyze herself before she looked at the room around her, she was at the Princeton home that she knew so well, but it was quiet, which was very usual. Christina then walked towards the door and saw that their was a party going on in the main hall of the Princeton home. As she exited her room, all the eyes shifted on her for a moment as she joined the party. She felt embrrassed, but continued onward. She very gently walked down the stairs and saw a very dressed up masked man waiting for her at the bottom of the steps, now noticing that this party was a masquerade. The man with the mask then spoked, "Good evening, Miss Hime, may I partake you to the dance floor?" Christina, watching this dream as her dream self said yes to masked man and took his hand, following him to the dance floor.

They began to dance, but even in her dreams, Christina was still somewhat clusmy, but the man in the mask didn't mind her clumsiness and just kept dancing with her, slowly moving them into the center of the dance as the other party members watched from the tables and the balconies that Christina was dancing with a elegant young man. What seemed like hours of dancing brought a smile to Christina's face and that someone was interested in her made her cheek reds. As the dance was nearing it's end, the young man then moved close to Christina and gently planted a kiss on her lips as the song reached it's final note, hearing roars of clapping hands as they pulled away. Christina watched as her dream self gently touched the man's cheek and slowly pulled away the mask to see Adam, smiling back to her...

With that, Christina woke up from her slumber and what felt like minutes of bliss become hours of sweet dreams that were ruined by her alarm clock, telling her it was time to get an early headstart on the day. As she got up however, she noticed she wasn't where she was before and was still clothed. Along with all this, there was also a single pack of cards sitting right next to her alarm clock, giving her many questions to think about if she choose to ponder on them at the moment.
1211111112211121121111122112211211211112.title: Christina's Dream

1211111112211121121111122112211211211112.content:
Christina just sighed heavily as she got up and prepared for the day, ignoring the pack that rested on the nearby table. Her head still spinning with confusion about her strange dream that somehow involved the one Ra Yellow that was one of the top students in the Academy and also someone who she was trying to top. Why would her own mind be trying to mess with her own plans to become the best? Christina had entered her bathroom and slowly began to splash cold water at her face so that she could wake up fully. "Urrh...Stupid Ra Yellow Wannabe! You have some nerve invading my dreams", Christina shouted at her own reflection, gazing directly into the mirror.

"Rough Night, Boss." Omaja Yellow's voice chimed as he appeared before Christina replied while trying to push Omaja Yellow away, "This is not the time for any interruptions right now...I thought we talked about this! No appearing when I'm in the bathroom!" It didn't help when both Green and Black arrived to apologize as that added more fuel to the fire that was Christina's morning, increasing her volume as she tried to shoo the Omajas away.

Meanwhile, on the other side of the academy at the Ra Yellow Dorm, Adam was already prepared and working on his decks for the day; making sure that he had multiple prepared in case of many challenges during the day. He knew better to play with the same deck at every duel, so he had to change up his strategies each day. He wondered if Christina had gotten his surprise as he worked on his deck editing and rebuilding, hoping that she was alright. He had a sense that there was some good within her, even if she had to hide it behind a mask of pride and hatred. After that, he got up and prepared to finished getting dressed up in uniform, smirking before grabbing his belt, duel disk, and notebooks into a nearby backpack and walking out the door.

Christina started to ask and after that she got up from her bed and then sat on it "All I remember was That bitch Jane kissing my sweet Adam, and then I... that's right I fell from the tree, but that means somebody brought me back here. Biography: When Linda and Amanda were born with Fonda, the three sisters became the best of friends growing up together. They all went to the same academy for girls where they learned about dueling and medicine since they all wanted to work in the medical department. Linda and Amanda may had missed classes from time to time, but they were passionate with their work and were able to graduate from their academy. Linda had an interest in using plants for medicine which was the reason she ended up using a plant based deck. Amanda liked seeing children in hospitals playing with toy and that lead her to using a toy based deck. Eventually, the three were all able to get jobs at Duel Academy, each of them becoming the headmistress of one of the dorms, Fonda working with the Obelisk Blues, Amanda with the Ra Yellows and Linda with the Slifer Reds. Linda and Amanda ended up liking the Slifers more then the others because they reminded them of themselves when they were in the academy. They continue to work to this very day, enjoying their days of teaching students of Duel Academy.

"That'll work." Alexis muttered as she took a breath of relief before snapping her fingers. "Oh!" She then started to write another section.

Extra Notes: Amanda has a crush on Sartyr and is the adopted mother of Marcel. Linda has a crush on Chancellor Shepard, but he is dense about it.

"Okay, then I'll call Syrrrrroooooouuhhhhh" Christina tried to say while turning her head over to Syrus, but then she slipped on a ice cube that was on the floor, and landed on her butt with a bang.

"Somethings will never change" Christina said with in a low voice while massaging her back
1211111112211121121111122112211211211112.title: Let's party some more

She muttered to herself as she realized she was upside down on the couch, head to the ground and feet in the air, exposing her panties. Blushing madly, she quickly got up before looking around, seeing other students that were knocked out from partying all night. "I wonder where the others are?" She thought as she looked around before finding. . .

1211111112211121121111122112211211211112.content:
"Ehi girls wake up" Jane said by trying to waking up her friends, but it was a lost cause, at least for Christina. Alexis in fact after a couple of try woke up and noticed that she was feeling like if the head was where the feet were and viceversa.

"Man really how much did we party last night?" Alexis asked

"I guess until we were no more able to move" Jane responded by trying to wake up Christina along with Jasmine and Mindy that were not to far from her, but it was futile. Jane then sighed, got up and said "Desperate time..." and with that she went in the near kitchen; after a couple of minutes she returned with something in her hand and finished "...desperate measures" and with that she put the ice she had in her hand inside Christina's clothes.

The reaction was immediate: Christina woke up in an instant and started jumping like crazy because of the ice "Cold, cold, cold, cold, cold, cold, cold, cold..." Christina screamed while continuing her jump dance.

The noise woke up Jasmine and Mindy, who immediately located the source of it

"Wow Christina still has so much energy" Jasmine commented

"She is a real party animal" Mindy confirmed

Meanwhile Christina continued jumping, until the ice felt off her shirt, but as soon as it got on the floor, Christina slipped on it, and she literaly flew on the couch and landed on her head

The girls quickly ran to her and asked "Are you all right?"

"I'm sorry about that Christina, but I didn't know what else to do" Jane apologized

"Tomorrow, I'd like you to put the alarm clock" Christina said with an exausted tone of voice, and after that, they all exploded in a group laugh

While the girls were hving their waking up party, the boys were in the common room of the Ra dorm, on a bed made of six mattresses

"MMMhhhh" Adam said while opening his eyes and then he noticed that something was wrong "Huh? Either the world his upside down today or it is me the one who is upside down" He said while looking around, when suddenly something landed on his face

"MMmpppphhhhhh, Hasmelpeppy gpt ymmr fppt op mm mace" Adam said (for those of you who don't understand the foot on the face language, he said: Hassalberry get your foot off my face).

"Two more millenium please mummy" Hasselberry said while turning around on the common bed the guys shared that night. With a little patience Adam was able to free her face and then decided that it was time to wake up, so he tried to stand up but then

"Ehi what, WOOOAAHHH" Adam screamed while landing on a mattress with his face, caused by the fact that Syrus grabbed his legs

"No mommy, stay with me five more minutes" Syrus moaned while still sleeping

"This is going to be a long day" Adam sighed

The girls had decided to head for the shower to freshen up before deciding to find the boys.

"I really think we over did it with the party." Jane said.

"Yeah. It did get pretty wild." Alexis said.

"But it was still fun though." Jasmine retorted.

The girls soon arrived at the showers to find it. . .
1211111112211121121111122112211211211112.title: Let's go back with the girls

1211111112211121121111122112211211211112.content:
The showers were in fact all right (apparently the party last night didn't went so far) so the grls decided to start changing when suddenly

"Ehi girls" Jaden screamed. All the girls turned their heads and noticed that the boys were coming their way as well

"Hi guys" Mindy and Jasmine responded happy to see the boys

Once the two groups were closed they started talking about thei respective after party and awakenings, they all laughed when they heard about Adam and Christina's troubles, but the fact that Jaden thought that Syrus's foot was an hot dog was the most bizare

"But you know, I wonder who felt worst: Jaden's mouth or Syrus's foot?" Jane asked

"That's a good question Jane" Bastion said and with that a group of laugh started again, until Hasselberry stopped the gang

"Hey guys listen since we are all here, why don't we go to the pool and relax a bit over there?" Hasselberry proposed and the proposal was very much accepted

30 minutes later

The entire gang was in the pool enjoying a bath together. Mindy, Jasmine and Christina were chatting together with Bastion, Hasselberry and Syrus while Jane and Adam were alone on one side of the pool and Jaden and Alexis were on the other one

"Do you think those guys will finally starts to get serious after this?" Mindy asked

"I hope so, because frankly, I don't know what else try" Hasselberry responded

"Let's see and find out" Christina responded and with that they divided in two groups ( Christina, Syrus, Bastion and Mindy, Jasmine, Hasselberry)went to check the situation of the four lovebirds

Jane and Adam side

"Last night was really something" Jane commented

"It sure was" Adm responded by getting closer to her

Jane responded by hugging him and said"You know I only missed one thing last night"

"Rrreaally? What?" Adam asked a little red in face

"This" Jane said and with that she kissed Adam on his lips. After a few seconds Adam responded to the kiss with the same passion that Jane put in hers.

Jaden and Alexis

"You sure have some strange tastes if you eat Syrus's foot" Alexis joked

"Oh come on now, I was still half asleep. Can't you give me a break" Jaden asked embarassed

"Only if you accept my little gift" Alexis said a little red on her face

"A gift for me?" Jaden asked surprised "What is it A new card?"

"Ah ah ah ah ah ah, no silly" Alexis said amused, but then she got serious again and said "It's this" and with that she kissed him on the lips, and just like Adam, Jaden responded with passion.

From their respective hideout the two trios gave to their partners a victory sign

"I think that the life here at the academy will be much better from now on" Christina commented in her head

choices: let's go with the love birds
Let's go with the gossip girls
1211111112211121121111122112211211211112.content:
A year passed from the day Christina challenged her sisters to a duel, and Alexis had made some improvments in the Duel Academy's staff members. A lot of things changed from back then , but a lot of things remained the same.
The first things that changed were the rank of many students: our group of heroes now was in fact composed by all Obelisk Blue students, except for one Ra Yellow and one Slifer Red. During the year, Christina, Adam, Bastion and Syrus managed to be promoted to the Obelisk Blue dorm, causing Christina to become a very respect and great duelist in the school and she was renamed "the fairy princess" of the Duel Monster, but she still was as clumsy as 1 year ago (however Jane said that that clumsiness of her was kind of an extra for her beauty and also made her "equilibrated").
Syrus, instead, by hanging out a lot with Adam and Bastion, managed to toughen up and became the small giant of the Obelisk Blue.
As for Adam and Bastion, they didn't change much, the only difference was that now that they were Obelisk Blue students, they were now even more famous and strong as they were before.
Jane and Alexis were still ranked as the two top female duelists in the academy, because even though Christina has improved a lot, one of her favourite hobby was still to create elaborate schemes (which now have a 50/50 shoot of success) with Jasmine and Mindy in order to make sure that their friends will find themselves, along with their boyfriends, in gossiping situations.
The only Ra Yellow of the group was of course Hasselberry, because he was one year younger than the others, however at the end of the year he was sure to be promoted at the Obelisk Blue dorm.
The only Slifer Red was Jaden of course, no matter what Jaden refused to change dorm.
The last thing to be said is that now the couples Jane/Adam and Jaden/Alexis were ow official and moving forwards with their relationships.
1211111112211121121111122112211211211112.title: Big and small changes

1211111112211121121111122112211211211112.content:
At the lake near the Obelisk blue dorm, two certain couple were enjoying a pic nic together, and at the same time, since they were hidding behind a big bush, trying to enjoying a little privacy, especially from a certain trio of girls

"Man I cannot believe we managed to organize this pic-nic without somebody, especially the gossip trio, finding it out" Alexis said

"Well it' was easy thanks to our card spirits messages exchange, also we have to thank the fact that today the auxiliary exam is held, and basically, only those with an average grades under 90 have to do it, so we are safe" Adam commented

"The real amazing thing is the fact that Jaden was able to get an average so high in just one year" Jane commented

"Oh come on, not this again" Jaden said feeling embarassed

"Well, his dueling skills were already more then excellent 1 year ago, he only needed a good tutor to help him out with the study stuff." Adam said by looking at Alexis

"I guess the power of love really can make miracles" Jane commented while giggling, causing both Alexis and Jaden to blush

"Let's change subject" Alexis said and then asked "How did you guys go in the exam?"

Jane then got a angry look on her face and pouted "I cannot believe I only got a 99"

"Over a 100 Jane" Adam commented by putting his hand on her shoulder "It's just one point less, how about you Alexis?"

"Perfect score with no problems, and you Adam?" Alexis said

"Aced the exam as well" Adam commented "What about you Jaden?" he then asked to his friend

"96, now that I pay attention in class it's easy" Jaden said

"My 99 is starting to feel very weak" Jane commented

"This is me not paying attention" Jaden said by making a funny expression on his face, causing a round of laugh

"Okay okay, we better start our pic-nic before somebody notices the laughing bush" Adam said and while they all continued giggling they prepared the glasses for a cheers

"Okay, a toast to us" Jane then said by raising her glass full of soda

"CHEERS" they all said and after that the pic-nic officially started
1211111112211121121111122112211211211112.title: A nice pic-nic

1211111112211121121111122112211211211112.content:
Elsewhere out at seas, a massive dark aura surrounded a ship like a tornado as it approached Duel Academy. At the bow of the ship, five girls in revealing yet seductive black outfits looked at the island with yellow eyes.

"There is it." The first girl said.

"The place that kicked us out." The second girl added.

"Just cause we were having fun." Two more said in unison.

"And now we will get our revenge for them." The final one said as an intense vortex of darkness surround her as she brought out a demonic looking duel disk. "And with these decks that surpass time, we'll show them all that we are the superior duelists." Lightning started to appear as it revealed that the girl who declared this was Naomi with a smug look on her face.

About an hour later, the boat docked at the island, and the five menacing girls got off. Naomi separated from the others and said "You four go find those love birds bastards and get your revenge on them, I have a score to settle with that clumsy idiot Christina" Naomi said as her eyes became really scary

"Yes sir" the four said and with that they headed for the Obelisk Blue dorm.

Meanwhile our heroes were finishing their pic nic when suddenly

"Did you guys fell that?" Jane asked worried

"Yeah, some evil auras are approaching us" Adam commented

"There are four of them" Alexis commented

"Five to be exact, one of them separated from the others" Jaden said as they all started to take their decks and dueldisks and went look for these threats. As they arrived in front of the blue dorm, they found out the truth.

"I cannot believe it. It's them" Jane commented with her mouth wide opened, once she saw the four mysterious girls

"Wait do you know them?" Jaden asked, causing a group fall down

"Jaden come on, they are the "henchwomen" of Naomi" Adam explained

"Their names are Asuna, Meru, Rurina and Ririna. We defeated them last year" Alexis continued

"Oh right, sorry guys" Jaden said to his friends.

"We are here to make you pay" Asuna scremed

"We will have our revenge" Meru continued

"You circus clowns are finished" Rurina and Ririna finished

"Circus clowns? Now that's a new one" Jane commented with an expression of disgust on her face and then continued "If you are here I suppose so is that bitch Naomi"

"The great Naomi is having her revenge on that fool Christina" Asuna said

"While we have the pleasure to defeat you" Meru continued

"So let's do this" Rurina and Ririna said together.

The gang looked at eachother

"We don't have a choice" Jaden said

"Let's take care of them" Jane continued

"But let's finish this quickly" Alexis said

"So we can go and check on Christina" Adam finished and with that eight dueldisk were activated and eight voices said "DUEL"

Meanwhile Naomi was walking to the woods while grinning

"You'll pay for what you did Christina, and this is the perfect instrument for your destruction" Naomi said as she drew a card revealing it to be a. . .
1211111112211121121111122112211211211112.title: A new threat

1211111112211121121111122112211211211112.content:
After looking at her card, Naomi put it back in her deck and resumed her research. Christina meanwhile had just separated from Mindy and Jasmine and was in her way back to the dorm when suddenly

"What is it? I feel a owerfull dark energy" Chrisytina thought when the answer appeared right in front of her "Naomi?" Christina asked surprised

"In the flesh, and with a vengeance as well" Naomi said. Christina got back her composure and said

"I am not the one you used to know anymore, I have improved a lot. I am not scared of you anylonger"

"What a coincidence, I improved as well, and trust me, when I am through with you, you'll be nothing more than dust on the ground" Naomi said by activating her duel disk

"Guess I don't have much of a choice" Christina said while taking her deck and dueldisk. After she put it on and the two girls both screamed "DUEL" as they each draw five cards

"I'll go first" Naomi said and with that she drew a card " I summon Dark Witch in attack mode (Lv 6, att 2600, def 1000)"

"What? A level 6 monster on the first turn?" Christina exclaimed

"Yeah, she can be special summon on my first turn, if there are no other cards on my field, but if I do that, I cannot make any normal summon during this turn. Also she cannot destroy monsters in battle, but that's no matter because as soon she attacks a monster that monsters loses half of his attack or defense point" Naomi explained "Next I play the spell card Dark assault, if I have a monster with Dark in its name, then that monster can cut its attack power in half and launch a direct attack for this turn, so now Dark Witch attack her directly, dark assault" Naomi ordered and the attack went successfull

Naomi 4000, Christina 2700

"I now activated the spell Dark assorber, which allows me to take the life points you just lost, so your loss becomes my gain" Naomi said and then laughed

Naomi 5300, Christina 2700

"Finally I play one face down and end my turn" Naomi said

"Okay my move" Christina said " And I play Gracefull charity, now I can draw three cards but then I have to discard two from my hand" and so Christina discarded the spell card Ojamagic and the monster card Tomb Fairy from her hand "Now thanks to Ojamagic I can draw the three Ojama brothers from my deck, also if Tomb Fairy is sent from my hand to the graveyard, it allows me to summon two fairy token on my field" Christina said as she added three cards from her deck and summoned two token on her field " I now sacrifice my tokens to summon Guardian Angel Joan in attack mode (Lv 8, att 2800, def 2000), next since I summoned a high level fairy type monster I can special summon the Angelic Archer from my hand in attack mode (Lv 3 att.800 def. 400) and I'll equip her with Cestus of Dagla, making her attack points rise by 500. Also she can attack my opponent directly. But first Saint Joan attack the Dark Witch" Christina ordered her monster

"I activate a trap card Dark exchange" Naomi screamed "Since you attacked a Dark monster, I can choose another one on my hand, summon it in attack mode and making him the new target, and I choose Dark spirit" Naomi said by summoning a new monster on the field (Lv4, Att.Def. 1300)"

"It doesn't matter attack" Christina screamed and with that her monster destroyed Dark Spirit "Now since Saint Joan destroyed a monster in battle, I regain life points equal to the attack points of the monster I just destroyed"

Naomi 3800, Christina 4000

"And now Dark Spirit effect is activated, if he is destroyed in battle, the monster responsible loses 1300 attack and defense points" Naomi said as Saint Joan got weaker (att.1500, def.700)

"If that's the case Angelic Archer attack Naomi directly" Christina orderd to her other monster and the attack went successfully " And also since he was equiped with Cestus of Dagla, your loss is my gain this time" Christina said

Naomi 2500, Christina 5300.

"Finally I play two face down cards and end my turn" Christina said as she placed on the field the trap cards Covering fire and Angel baton ( a trap that allows the player to summon a level 4 or lower fairy type monster from his/her deck if one on the field is destroyed)

"Well then my turn" Naomi said as she draw her next card and smiled "I summon the tuner monster Dark Ambra (Lv3. Att. & Def.0)

"Tuner Monster?" Christina asked surprised

"That's right. This is the future of Duel Monster you fool" Naomi explained and then continued "and now allow me to show you this incredible power, the power of Synchro as I now tune my Dark Ambra with Dark Witch in order to synchro summon...
1211111112211121121111122112211211211112.title: Naomi and Christina's battle

1211111112211121121111122112211211211112.content:
"Dark Seductress Naomi?" Christina asked surprised as soon as a monster that looked a lot like Naomi (Lv9, att.3000,def.1500) appeared on the field "You got to be kidding me" Christina then said with a very disgusted look on her face

"Be sceptical if you want, but this beautiful monster will be your doom" Naomi said

"Exactly what part of that thing is beautiful?" Christina thought in her head, but then she was interrupted by Naomi

"Now for her special abilities, the first one is that she gains 300 extra attack points for every dark monster in my graveyard, and since I have three, her attack power is now 3900. Now my seductress attack St. Joan with Dark Mist of Seduction" Naomi ordered her monster, who inhaled a lot of breath, making her boobs grow and bounce, and after that she expelled a dark purple mist from her lips that attacked Christina's monster.

"I play my trap, covering fire so now I can reduce the damage of your attack by making the Angelic Archer share her power to St. Joan" Christina said by activating her trap and making St.joan attack power gp up to 2800, but it was still not enough to defeat Naomi's monster. And in fact St.Joan was destroyed

Naomi 2500, Christina 4200

"Next her second special ability kicks in, since she destroyed a monster in battle you lose another monster, so say farewell to your Archer" Naomi said as she pointed to Christina's other monster who exploded

"Damn" Christina whispered

"And that's not all. You will now lose lifepoints equal to half the sum of the original attack points of both your monsters" Naomi said by snapping her fingers, and with that Christina lost 1800 life points

Naomi 2500, Christina 2800

"Finally I play the spell card Dark spell of Naomi" Naomi said

"Are you serious?" Christina asked with another face of disgust

"Deadly serious" Naomi responded with a grin on her face" I can only play this card if Dark Seductress Naomi is on the field and if a monster on your field has been destroyed by her special power. Now you'll lose a number of life points equal to that monster original attack points, while I regain that same amount" Naomi explained

"No way" Christina exclaimed, but it was all true, since Dark Seductress Naomi pointed her finger to Christina and emitted a beam of light who hitted her at the heart, subtracting her energy

Naomi 3300, Christina 2000

"Ugh, I play my second trap, Angel Baton" Christina said with pain in her voice and then continued "Since you destroyed one of my monsters in battle, I can now summon a level four or lower fairy type monster from my hand or deck, and so from my deck arrives Fairy Disciple ( Lv2, att. & def. 300)" and with that, what looked like a little pixie appeared on the field

"Ah ah ah ah ah ah ah ah ah ah ah, you really are pathetic, reling on those pathetic creatures to save yourself" Naomi laughed and then said "Anyway, I end my turn, let's see what you got princess"

"Oh you'll see all right you bitch, it's my turn" Christina said and drew a card "First since it's my stand by phase, the effect of Fairy Disciple is activated, now I can summon up all the Fairy Disciples that I have in my hand, deck or graveyard" Christina explained as she summoned two more Fairy Disciples on the field "Next I'll play Pot of Greed, so I can draw two more cards" Christina continued as she looked at her two new cards and smiled "I now sacrifice my three monsters in order to summon my ultimate weapon" And with that the three little fairies that Christina had on her field disappeared and instead a beautiful and shinny tall Fairy with gold hair appeared "Meet Chrianna, the Fairy Queen (Lv9, att.2900, def.2600)" Christina said

"Another fairy? You really are pathetic! Ah Ah Ah Ah Ah Ah Ah Ah Ah Ah" Naomi laughed again

"Laugh while you can" Christina thought and then said " Since I sacrificed three fairy mosters, I can now activate all three of her special abilities"

"Did you said 3?" Naomi asked a little bit scared

"Yes, the first one is that for every monster card I discard from my hand, a monster in your graveyard is removed from play, so I discard the three ojama brothers Iin my hand to remove your three Dark monsters in your graveyard" Christina explained

"What?" Nami screamed

"Go for it boss" The ojama trio said

"Thanks guys and sorry" Christina said to her cards, while discarding them. After that, the three Dark monsters In Naomi's grveyard where removed from game, making the attack power of Dark Seductress Naomi go down to 3000.

"Next the second ability, by paying 1000 of my life points I can resurect up to 2 fairy type monsters from my graveyard, so let's say welcome back to St. Joan and the Angelic Archer" Christina said and after paying the price her monsters resurected

Naomi 3300, Christina 1000

"So let me get this straight, you sacrifice three cards and a 1000 life points just to resummon two weaklings and making my monster just a little bit weaker?" Naomi asked with a sarcastic ton of voice

"Wait for it, I still have one ability to play. By discarding my entire hand to the graveyard and paying half my lifepoints, for this turn only my queen will gain the ability of absorb the attack power of every fairy type monster on the field" Christina said as she discarded her two cards and payed half of her lifepoints

Naomi 3300, Christina 500

"WHAT? NO WAY! IT'S NOT FAIR" Naomi screamed

"Oh it is fair" Chrstina said as she saw her monster attack power grow to 6500 "Learn this lesson of humility Naomi, you'll never win unless you change, and redime yourself" Christina said

"SHUT UP! I'M A TRUE CHAMPION NOT A WEAKLING LIKE YOU" Naomi screamed with rage

"I guess you'll never learn huh? Well let me tell you something Miss Champion, YOU LOST" Chrsitina screamed and then ordered "CHRIANNA ATTACK HER MONSTER NOW, WITH SUPREME WIND OF THE FAIRIES"

And with that Chrianna started to dance and then emitted a light blue wind which destroyed in an instant Naomi's monster

Naomi 0, Chrsitina 500

"You lost Naomi" Christina said, but then she noticed something that scared her a bit

"NNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!" Naomi screamed for the frustration and also because she saw that her entire body was enveloped by a dark flame. After about one minute, Naomi stopped screaming felt on the ground unconscious. Christina quickly ran to her and checked her pulse.

"Good she is still breathing, but I wonder what happened to her" Christina thought and then decided "I should go to
1211111112211121121111122112211211211112.title: Dark Seductress Naomi vs Chrianna the Fairy Queen

choices: They are reached by the others
1211111112211121121111122112211211211112.content:
Christina decided to take her pda and call for some help from the infirmary

"Hello this is the Duel Academy infirmary" a femaile voice responded to Christina

"Hello Ms Fontaine, this is Christina. I need some help" Christina said and then she explained to Miss Fontaine where she was and what happened

"Don't worry dear, I'll send someone to help you right away" Linda Fontaine responded

"Thank you Miss Fontaine" and with that Christina shut off her pda and waited for the backup. She looked at Naomi

"Man what a power hungry woman, to think that once I was just like her until my friends changed me" Christina thought, and then a tear started to came out from her eye, thinking that if it wasn't for her friends, she probably would have ended up exactly like Christina "Still, I feel sorry for her" Christina thought while continuing look at Naomi.

Two minutes later, a few members of the security of Duel Academy arrived and took Naomi to the infirmary, while Christina followed them. once there, she noticed she wasn't alone

"Guys, you are here too?" Christina asked to Alexis, Jane, Adam and Jaden

"Yes, we had some unpleasent encounters" Jane responded

"Really? With..." Christina was about to ask but then she looked at the rest of the beds and noticed that the Naomi's gang was on them, and understood

"They came to us looking for revenge" Adam explained

"But they didn't last more then two round" Alexis continued

"But what's strange is that they used these strange synchro card and attacked us with them" Jaden said

"The same went for me, Naomi here tried to attack me with this bizarre card that looked a lot like her, but I was able to defeat her in the end" Christina said

"We should really stop to worry about you" Jane said with a smile "At least about dueling"

"Oh don't worry Jane, you know that the gossip trio takes a break every once in a while" Christina responded and that caused a group of laughs.

After that they redirected their attention to the Fontaine twins and asked

"So what do you think Miss Fontaine?" Alexis asked

"Their phisique are all right, but it seems like they are exausted behind the human limit" Amanda Fontaine explained

"It was probably that blue flame that enveloped their bodies when they lost their duels that caused this" Jane said, and everyone in the gang agreed

"I say the best thing to do is to wait and see" Fonda Fontaine responded

"Okay Miss Fontaine thanks" the gang responded and with that they exited the infirmary

Once outside they started to discuss

"How do you think they got their hands on those cards?" Alexis asked

"From what I heard from my father, Synchro Monster really exist, it's a new generation of card, that will be released in a few months on the market" Adam explained

"Naomi's father is a director of the Industrail Illusions so I guess that's how she knew about it" Jane said, while the others agreed

"But, how did they had those specific cards? I cannot believe that someone from I.I. will create those cards expecially for them?" Christina asked

"I think they created themselves" Jane proposed "Rurina and Ririna were pretty good in drawing, so they designed those cards for themselves and the others"

"But their duel disk shouldn't have been able to read them" Adam then said

"Unless they were powered up by the darkness." Jaden said by taking the word for the first time "They were not using normal dueldisk. I guess that after they designed those cards, they somehow opened a portal in the dark dimension and gave all their energy in order to make those cards powerful and their dueldisks able to substain them" Jaden finished

"That would explain their current status" Jane said "Since they lost, all their energy is now in the dark dimension"

"Still I feel pity for them" Christina said with a sad tone

"Me too" Adam approved

"We all do" Alexis said and everybody got a sad expression on their faces.

A while later
1211111112211121121111122112211211211112.title: the infirmary

choices: Let's go see Christina and Jose
1211111112211121121111122112211211211112.content:
Exactly six months have passed from the day that Naomi and her friends failed in taking their revenge on the Duel Academy. Because of their loses they spent about two months in an hospital bed (they were sent back to the city of Domino exactly three days after their matches at Duel Academy). Once they got back in health, the police arrested them. Thanks to Naomi's father, his daughter and her friends were able to escape prison, but he had to pay an ingent sum to the Duel Academy to cover up this story. Naomi, however, along with her friends were forced to pass the next ten years of their lifes in a woman military campus, a very strict one too. And after that, they will pay their debt with society by doing only comuity services for work. Their lives as duelists and basketball players were officially over.

In the cafeteria of the Duel Academy

"And this is it" Jane finished reading the news about Naomi she had just received from her mother.

"Those bitches sure deserve that" Hasselberry commented after hearing the news from Jane

"Still I am sad. They had so much potential, and they ruined everything for a little bit of power" Jaden said with a sad face. Everybody started to feel a bit sad as well

"I know how you feel Jaden, but remember. It is not our abilities that determine who we are, our choices does" Alexis said by putting a hand on Jaden shoulder

"Alexis is right Jaden, they choose their own fate" Adam said.

Everybody stayed silence for a bit then Syrus talked "I'm still surprised that the gossip trio was so much silent about those duels. Usually they run everywhere saying what great victories were aquired"

"I guess Christina didn't want too much publicity, but rather a bit of privacy to think about her future" Bastion said

1211111112211121121111122211211111111121.content:
Adam had a little smile on his face and spoke, "It took a very long time to gain both their trust. Like I mentioned before, My father worked extensively with Seto Kaiba and Maxamillion Pegasus, but he mainly worked with Seto. When I was younger and learning about Duel Monsters, I was given a tour of KaibaCorp. Like today, Seto wasn't the happiest guy, but he knew that I was different than the other worker's kids. About half a year after that, My Father got me a deck and trained with me a little, then a few days, Me and my father went back to KaibaCorp, Mokuba saw me shuffling my deck in my father's office and wanted to duel against me. I wasn't good with my cards, but I accepted. I lost the first duel against him, but then after a few more duels, I was able to get him down lower, but still lost. Little did we know, Seto and my father was watching us from his office. Seto wondered why I didnt just gave up after the first loss, since he saw I wasn't any good."

Adam took a short breath and continued, "During the time until my next visit, I watched many duels and I formally met Pegasus, who took great interest to me and my deck. After the duels with Mokuba, my father was working on a big project for Seto, so I stayed longer and got more acquainted with Mokuba. After a while, I got a new deck, My Dragons that I use now. I kept my old warriors deck and placed it in a safe spot at home. Me and Mokuba were close friends when I got my dragons, he always thought I was turning into Seto. But Seto knew I treated Mokuba like a brother to me, and he respected that. Then about a year after that, Seto came to me and saw my deck was all dragons, no other card but dragons. He heard that I started beating Mokuba with these, so he challenged me. I knew it was a great honor so I brought everything to the duel. Seto didn't trash talk as much, since I was the son of his most valued worker. I did lose the duel, but I got him down to 100 life points, and I had the right card to finish him next turn. Seto smiled and started to "tudor" me on combos with my deck. When I dueled a bully in my school, he was decimated and couldn't touch me. About near the end of high school, Kaiba gave me a graduation gift, 3 copies of his most infamous card, Blue-Eyes White Dragon. I was speechless. He told me that this is my gift to you for all your hard work and for taking card of my brother. I accepted them and after that, I became close friends with Seto." Adam then stopped and looked at Jane and spoke, "Sure, Seto might look like a pain sometimes, but you really don't know a person until you walk in their shoes and see it from their perspective."

Meanwhile Adam

As the limo ride came to an end, my limo driver then placed the limo in park and then got out to open the door for the young lovebirds. Jane got out first, followed by Adam and they entered into the main lobby of the Downtown Domino City Condos, The lobby was extremely fancy with marble columns and white tile floor. It was a beautiful April morning in Domino city, and in the penthouse of a luxurious building, the clock was about to sound the seven o'clock alarm. A very beautiful woman stopped the clock and decided that it was time to get up. As soon as she did, she put a dressing gown and headed for the kitchen in order o have breakfast. As she approached the kitchen, Jane started to smell the sent of coffee, and once she entered the kitchen, she noticed that a man was preparing her breakfast.

"You are already up dear?" Jane asked to the man

"Yeah, I have an important meeting later, and I cannot affort to be late" Atticus responded by giving Jane a cup of coffee

"Thanks" Jane said by taking the cup and drinking a bit. Then she looked out of the gigantic window and sighed "I can't believe that already 10 years have passed since the day when my Adam has left us" Jane said witha very sad tone

"Yeah" Atticus confirmed, sad as well "It's hard to believe that your husband died in such an accident"

After that she continued "Couldn't you lose a match or two Mister "Supreme Emperor Kaiser"? You have been undefeated for 9999 duels so far in 15 years of dueling for the Duel Monster Professional League"

Adam turned his serious look into a grin "This coming form the woman who decided to build an additional room in the house in order to make a trophy room to celebrate my victories?" Adam asked, causing Jane to blush

"I... I... I was just tired of having all your trophies lying around the house" Jane defended herslf

"Oh really, and what about the fact that you made an entire section dedicated to me in the hall of fame of the Duel Academy situated in Domino city?" Adam countered

"It... it was a decision of the boards of directors" Jane said

"But since you are the Chancellor of the Duel Academy, doesn't that means that you proposed that?" This time was Atticus time to speak

"ATTICUS" Jane screamed as red as a tomato

"Sorry you for the screams" Adam said blushing as well.

After that they heard somebody entering the room and noticed it was

Alexander and Micheal Kaiser (twin brothers, 14 years old, first year, forwards of the Duel Academy soccer team, probably best freshmen duelist in the school) pratically jumped over their father happy to see that their hero was back at home.

"Well they are defenetly good at school, but still when they are at home they act a little bit too relaxed if you ask me, only taliking about soccer and dueling and really their manners need a lot of work" Jane commented with a serious and amused look on her face

"MOM" Alexander and Micheal said together embarassed by what their mother just said

"Our mom is right" Another female voice said "Alex, Mich you two should act better considering who our parents are" Sarina said

Sarina Kaiser (16 years old, eldest daughter of Jane and Adam, third year, best student for three years in a row at the Duel Academy, excellent duellist and captain of the Karate club of the Academy) entered the kitchen already in her school uniform

"Sarina" Adam said with joy as soon as she saw his little princess

"Good morning father" Sarina said in a very elegant manner and then continued" I am happy that you are at home, will you stay longer this time?"

"My next duel oversea is schedued in ten days, so I'll stay home for a week" Adam explained to her daughter while kissing her on the forehead

"Okay you two enough" Jane said to her sons, "Finish your breakfast and go change yourself, we cannot afford to be late today. After all your father 10.000th duel wil be host nowhere else than Duel Academy" Jane said

3 hours later

In the biggest Duel Arena Of the Duel Academy, a crowd of almost 50.000 spectators was gathering and taking their seats in order to watch the most anticipated duel of the champion Adam Kaiser. In addition to the students there were also Tv staff of 25 different telivisions and almost 200 famous duelist of different Duel Leagues.

"HHHHEEELLLLLLLLOOOOO Duel Academy" The announcer of the match said with his mike while entering the field and then continued "I have to say, it's a real honor being here today, in this spectaluar place where future champions of Duel Monster are created. There are more than 50.000 person in this arena, and I'll bet that pratically the entire world of Duel Monster's fans is watching this on Tv, and can you blame them? After all, we are about to witness the 10.000 duel of a man that has never known the meaning of the word defeat since he joined the Duel Monster Professional League. If he manages to win today's match he will really be part of the history of Duel Monster. So without any further hesitation, allow me to introduce you, the one, the only, the Supreme Emperor Adam Kaiser"

The announcer finished his speech and with that a giant smoke screen appeared on the field, and after a couple of fireworks Adam appeared on the scene, and it was in that moment that it seemed like the entire structure was about to fall. The entire crowd of 50.000 spectators got up from their seats and clapped their hands, whistled and called their champion. Pratically the entire stadium ruted for him. As soon as he entered his position, Adam was reached by the announcer who started to ask a few questions

"That was quite the welcome Mr Kaiser, do you want to say something to all your fan?"

"Well, first like you said, I want to say thank you for that incredible welcome" Adam responded and with that another round of applauses arrived, then Adam continued " But still folks, let's save some of them for my opponent okay?"

"My, a true gentleman, no doubt. Now, about your duel, I think we all wanted to know what surprises will you reserve us. Can you give us a few anticipations?" The announcer continued

"All I can say is that today, since my family will be watching me alive, I'm not allowed to show half assed play so I will give everything I have" Adam responded

"Oh right. Your children are students of this academy, correction, best students in this academy. I guess like father like sons and daughter right?" The announcer continued "Speaking of which, aren't they over there?" The announcer asked pointing to three spectators on the first row

Adam looked in that direction and saw his daughter and his sons who were just wavering their father

"Do your best father" Sarina screamed

"We are routing for you dad" Michael screamed

"Defeat your opponent daddy" Alexander screamed as well

Adam responded to his sons and daughter encouragments by wavering his hand

"My, my such passion. You must be very proud of your children sir" The Announcer continued

"I sure am" Adam responded and then continued "but it's also thanks to their mother's hard work if they are so exceptional" and with that the crowd started another round of applauses

"Right Jane Rhodes, or rather Jane Kaiser, the chancellor of this Academy. She is entered the Dueling Pofessional World as well, but only for a short period, in order to take care of your family. And then 10 years ago, she was selected as the chancellor of this new Duel Academy. Maybe I am out of order, but I think that many persons will like to know the answer. If your wife was still a pro, will she be a threat to your title?" The anouncer asked

"Even though she retired from the professional league, that doesn't mean she isn't strong. In fact she is one of the best," Adam said, but then she assumed a proud expression and said "but no she won't be a threat to me"

"I HEARD THAT" a voice said from above, causing both Adam and the announcer to look up. Jane just entered the arena and heard the last part of Adam's speech so she took a mike from her seat, and responded back

"Speak of the devil, let's ask a few quesion to Mrs Kaiser. Will you root for your husband today?" The announcer asked

Jane smiled and said "Of course I route for my husband, but I'll also route for his opponent, Kevin Wetner. After all, if he manages to win, my husband will have more time to spent with his family giggle" Jane concluded causing a round of laughs

"Well Mr Kaiser, how will you respond to this affermation by your wife?" The announcer then asked to Adam

What will Adam respond?
