1211111112211121121111122211211111111121.content:
Adam then leaned up to the microphone and said out to the crowd and to the announcer, "I have never been a person to badmouth my opponent when they aren't here to defend their honor, but all I am going to say is this..." Adam paused dramatically and then continued with a smile, "I hope that Kevin Westner will not disappoint my wife or this crowd... I know that we would all dislike that, but I have seen Kevin's climb to the top and this is where it has lead him, so this will be a good match for us all and I will give all I can to defend my title as long as it's mine to defend.

Adam then backed up from the mic to hear the roar of the crowd as they were either agreeing with him or booing at him, but stood tall as he waited for his opponent to show up in the arena and have his moment with the announcer, but slowly began to walk to his side where he began to mediate in his mind.
1211111112211121121111122211211111111121.title: A Gentleman to the End...

1211111112211121121111122211211111111121.content:
As soon as Adam returned to his place, the announcer started to speak once again

"All right folks, now it's time to introduce the challenger. A man who has fought a lot to have the honor of being on this stage and to face the champion Kaiser. So everybody raise your hands and applaude this great new talent Kevin Westner"

Once the announcer finished his speech, another smoke screen appeared on stage and after another set of fire works a tall man with red hairs entered the stadium. The applause that Kevin recieved from the audience wasn't quite like the one Adam had recieved but still was strong enough to be heard three miles away. As soon as he reached his position, the anouncer approached him and started his interview

"All right Mister Westner. How are you feeling today?" the announcer asked

"I' m ready to duel, and I promise to all the people that have come here today to route for me that I will not disappoint them, and that I will give everything I got to become the new champion" Westner responded to the crowd. The reaction to that speech were a lot and different: there were those who really admired Kevin and so gave a big round of applause to him, there were those that liked Westner's ambitions, and also there were some boohs from Adam dedicated Fans

"Wow we have someone very ambitious here. All right folks, you don't have to wait anymore. The time has arrived. Miss Kaiser" The anouncer said talking to Jane "Will you do the honors?"

Jane then got up from her seat and said" Adam Kaiser, Kevin Westner, I asked you both to give everything you have in this duel. ANd now let's this competition finally begin" Jane then put down her mike and setaed while Adam and Kevin prepared their duel disks

"LET'S DUEL" Adam and Kaiser both screamed
1211111112211121121111122211211111111121.title: Kevin Westner Enters

1211111112211121121111122211211111111121.content: Who will the winner be?
1211111112211121121111122211211111111121.title: And the winner is...

1211111112211121121111122211211111111121.content:
About an hour after the begining of the duel...

"Now Light and Darkness Dragon, attack ny opponent directly. End this duel with Shinning Breath" Adam ordered to his dragon, which atteacked Westner directly causing his life points to go down to zero.

"And it's over. After a duel of an hour, 70 turns and almost 35 cards for deck played the winner of this incredible duel, which makes this his 10.000 victory in a rod, is the one and only SUPREME EMPEROR ADAM KAISER" the announcer screamed at the mike.

It was like a gigantic bomb exploded, the entire stadium screamed, hundreds of students and fans got out from their seats and entered the stadium and once they got near Adam some of them took on their shoulders, screamed his name and brought in triumph for pratically the entire Duel Academy. While Adam was thanking the crowd, he saw that his sons and his daughter were still on their seats and were holding a signboard with the words

"DAD YOU ARE THE GREATEST".

That sign really moved Adam, who saluted with his hand his "children". After that, Adam looked up to see his wife, who was smilling at him and making a strange sign. Adam responded with a thumb up, sign that he understood what she meant, and after that he was taken outside of the stadium by the crowd.

Around sunset, on the roof of the Duel Academy

Jane was watching the sun going down on the sea, while suddenly she heard a door opening behind her. She turned around and said

"Oh look who it is. Mr Legend has finally arrived. I was beginning to think that all those enthusiastic fans made you forget our appointment" Jane said to Adam jokingly

"Like that will ever happen" Adam responded with the same tone, and then reached his wife and hugged her.

"Congratulation on your 10.000 victory champion." Jane said and then continued "Here is your reward " and with that she gave Adam a very long and passionate kiss. Afer about five minutes they separeted eachother.

"At what number of kisses on this roof are we?" Adam asked

"I think 1734" Jane said while giggling. After that they both looked at the sunset

"You can almost grab the sun with your hand here right?" Adam said

"Yeah" Jane responded "And the ocean makes you feel calm and relaxed"

"Yeah, but the best part is staying here with you" Adam continued

"Okay enough with these" Jane concluded, surprising Adam " We are not teenager anymore afterall"

"Oh come on. as if we had grown up since those days" Adam said "Don't you think I know that you choose this place because you hope to see our old school from here" Adam finished with a grin.

"Oh yeah Mr wiseguy, and what about you? You were the one who decided on this date after dueling back when we started dating in school" Jane responded.

Adam and Jane looked at eachother and then laughed

"Do you miss those days?" Adam asked

"Sometimes, but you know what. I really like the present that I'm living" Jane responded with a big smile on her face

"Same goes for me" Adam said and with that they kissed again.

"And the future seems to be very promising" Jane continued once they separated

"Speaking of future" Adam said " I heard that they are about to create a new era of Dueling. Dueling on motorcycle" Adam said

"Really?" Jane asked surprised

"Yeah, so what do you say Miss Chancelor are you still up for a ride?" Adam asked to her wife with a grin on his face

"Careful Adam, when you play with Mrs Kaiser you are going to get burnt" Jane said with an intimidating voice but a big smile on her face

"Oh really?" Adam asked and continued "Then let's see how much hot you can be". And after that the two started to play a little game of catch me if you can.

"Come on we have to go now. The Others are waiting" Jane said when she stopped

"Don't you know that the stars deserve a 15 minutes break?" Adam asked while laughing

"Come on Mr Star let's go" Jane said

"By your command ny queen" Adam responded and with that he took her wife arm in arm and returned in the building.


Adam and Jane continue their life as duelists and as a couple together with their friends and family. But this is another story


THE END?
1211111112211121121111122211211111111121.title: The end

Several different chefs from all across the globe worked in the kitchen, providing students with healthy, delicious meals, desserts, snacks, everything imaginable. The cafeteria room itself was nothing to scoff at either. Large floor to ceiling windows let in plenty of light. Sitting arrangements ranged from simple table and chairs, to comfortable booths complete with comfortable cushions, to the Obliesk Blue Lounge which was seemed to be a cross between a traditional smoking room and a pile of pillows, though that was reserved for those in the Obelisk dorm. There was also the covered roof though it was one of the lesser chosen options as the blankets Duel Academy provided were not the softest and the roof tended to be rather windy at times.

While Jaden normally would just stride over to the sandwich corner and pull a couple of cold sandwiches from the refrigerated shelves, he found himself more interested in finding something a bit more healthy. Looking through the options, Jaden soon found himself in a rather long line. And while at first he was annoyed as his growling stomach protested, he soon realized he was actually standing right next to Alexis.

"Hey Alexis, so you thinking Spaghetti and Meatballs as well?" asked Jaden with a smile.

"Maybe a few meatballs, but I'm thinking I'll mainly have a salad," answered Alexis.

"Ah, come on. This isn't another diet or some sort of health thing is it?" asked Jaden. "I mean, you look fine to me."

Alexis blushed slightly though she didn't know whether it was out of embarrassment for having to admit she was watching her figure or that Jaden had noticed. "Well... it is a bit of a diet, just trying to watch my calories. Besides, if I get a salad, that means I don't have to feel guilty about taking one of those oversized chocolate chip cookies." Jaden looked past Alexis and sure enough at the far end near the register was a stack of large, cookies, each one almost as big as a folded up duel-disk.

"Always thinking ahead Alexis. I might just follow your lead," responded Jaden with a quick smile.

The two friends got to talking and were soon discussing strategies, funny internet videos, and just talking. To Alexis it felt strange to have Jaden talking this much to her. He always seemed to have Cyrus or Hasselberry by his side. However, she welcomed the strangeness, soon finding it rather a joy. She soon found herself talking far more openly with Jaden than she ever had before. Jaden, while having always seen Alexis as a friend and great duelist, began to realize how much he liked talking with her.

During this waiting period, Jaden continued to change physically. Jaden lost a few more inches in height, now the exact same height as Alexis. His hair continued to grow out as well, becoming much more feminine. and now reaching down to halfway down his neck. Jaden's hands slimmed, still masculine, but definitely softer. The young man's butt and hips swelled slightly, his pants stretching to accommodate the now more feminine behind.

Following Alexis's example, Jaden did add a salad to his lunch. In fact, Jaden started walking to the register and realized he'd actually nearly completely forgotten to grab any meatballs or spaghetti. After quickly fixing that, Jaden was sure to grab two cookies, paid for his lunch and joined Alexis on the other end of the register.

"So," began Jaden as he joined Alexis, "Where do you want to eat."

Alexis looked around. "Cafeteria seems pretty crowded today. How about the roof?"

"Sure." Jaden and Alexis began to climb the stairs. As Jaden made his way up the second flight of stairs to the roof, Jaden barely heard a small thud and then felt something cold on his foot. Looking down, Jaden was surprised to find his right boot had fallen off and now lay two steps behind him. Jaden quickly went after the boot and tried to use his socked foot to right it.

"Jaden, everything okay?" called Alexis.

"Yeah, my boot just fell off, I don't know how," answered Jaden, still struggling to get his foot back in the suddenly too big boot. After a few more tries, Jaden decided to stop playing around. He slipped his left boot off and picked up both boots. Reaching the top of the stairs, Jaden was about to try again with his boots, when he noticed Alexis was standing, holding the door to the outside. The thing that caught Jaden's attention was that Alexis had apparently discarded her boots as well, revealing a pair of simple white ankle socks with a slight light blue to the toe. Jaden smiled and went out onto the rooftop, completely unaware of how much their relationship and world was about to change.
12111111221121.title: Yes

choices: Jaden and Alexis hear an odd sound and decide to investigate...
Jaden asks Alexis why she likes skirts over pants...
121111112211211.content:
Jaden and Alexis stepped out onto the Roof. The Roof was not the actual roof of Duel Academy's Cafeteria. However, the area was so high up that some student long ago must have felt they were close enough, and the nickname stuck. The eating area itself was nice. Essentially divided into two areas, shaded and not shaded, students had almost as much choice of where to sit as in the Cafeteria proper. The shaded section boasted several simple tables, some blocked off by planters allowing for privacy when students wished for it. The non-shaded section boasted far fewer tables and a number of benches for students to use. However, the major reason students came here were for the grand views and the picnic option. For just a dollar, students were able to rent a blanket and use it until they returned it. Granted these blankets were often not as comfy as some would prefer, but some of the blankets were perfect. And even though Jaden and Alexis had not even sat down, one look at the blanket and Jaden knew he was lucky.

Dropping his boots by the side of the blanket, Jaden took a seat on the blanket which quickly turned into laying down. The blanket was essentially a down quilt, impressively soft, with enough cushioning that those who wanted could outright sleep on it without a pillow. Alexis joined Jaden on the blanket, though she resisted the urge to lay down as well. "Better hurry Jaden or your food will get cold."

"Gawh~!" cried the young man as he sat up like a rocket. "That would be horrible!" Jaden paused for a moment, trying to sell his worry. Alexis soon burst into laughter, being caught off guard by the unexpected joke.

Once Alexis and Jaden stopped laughing, the two set about with their lunch idly chatting as they ate. As the two ate, Jaden's physical changes continued. His hips and butt finished expanding, reaching about the same size as Alexis, which strained Jaden's pants. Jaden no doubt would have tried to adjust his pants had his waist not shrunken in, giving him the beginnings of an hourglass figure. Jaden's arms lost some muscle and began their transition to feminine. By the time Jaden was done scarfing down the last of his main course, Jaden's hair was down to his shoulders and was starting to get in his face a bit.

Brushing his hair aside, Jaden muttered mostly to himself, "Why is my hair being so... annoying today. Maybe I should've gotten that haircut the other day." Jaden nor Alexis noticed Jaden's voice sounded a little higher than usual.

Seeing Jaden in distress, Alexis pulled out a small bag and pulled out something, Jaden couldn't really see. "Jaden," stated Alexis as she turned her seating position towards Jaden. "Look at me." Following the request, Jaden watched as Alexis's hands flew to the sides of his head. He heard two quick snaps and Alexis retracted her hands.

Jaden was about to object when he noticed that his hair was out of his face. He turned to face Alexis who was now holding a small mirror. In the mirror he saw his normal face, a handsome, yet soft face of a kind, brave, fun-loving soul, whose long hair had been curtailed by two light pink hairclips. Jaden was about to object, but the more he looked at the clips, the more he liked them. "Thanks Alexis, these are... really," Jaden wanted to say cute, but resisted. "Helpful. I owe you one for sure."

"Oh, you don't have to," answered Alexis with a slight blush. "I've had those clips in my bag for a while, my aunt gave them to me and I've never used them." Alexis, turned her face away, not wanting to show off her blush. Looking down, Alexis noticed that her altered seating position actually exposed some her underwear to Jaden. Before Alexis could be embarrassed, she was surprised to find herself thinking how annoyed she was that Jaden was not blushing as well. Yet, why should he be embarrassed to see her undergarments. They were friends after all. Though not entirely solid, the thoughts were strong enough to hold Alexis's deeper suspicions away.

Tapping her finger to her lip, Alexis noted that her lips were a little chapped and quickly turned to her bag. Within seconds, Alexis found a small container and flipped it open, applying the healing balm to her lips. "Hey Alexis, what is that?" asked Jaden, his feet now crossed in front of him.

"Oh, it's just lip balm. Cherry Flavored, would you like some?" offered Alexis, as she extended the container to Jaden. Jaden swiped his finger in the medicinal goo and came away with a glob that Alexis knew would be too much. However, Jaden did his best to apply the medicine and while he did not make a mess of it, clearly Jaden had never done this before.

"Tastes pretty good," offered Jaden with a smack, "I've never really been good with this make up stuff."

"Well, I'm sure if you were to practice it once in a while you'd figure it all out, just like dueling," stated Alexis.

"Yeah, but I'm not really built to be... pretty," stated Jaden. "We guys have to dashing and handsome all the time."

"Not all the time," replied Alexis, "People should just focus on being who they are and who they eventually want to be instead of trying to please everyone. Besides, I'm sure you would look very pretty with just the right make up."

"Oh yeah?" stated Jaden with the tone of a challenge. "I don't know, Alexis. I'm Jaden Yuki, quite the manly stud. Your paltry makeup will have no effect on this handsome face." Jaden's tone was clearly joking and to exaggerate his statement, Jaden flexed his dainty arms. Alexis nearly broke out in a laugh, which forced her to spread her legs wide, further exposing herself to Jaden. However, Alexis maintained control of the laugh, calmed herself, and dove once more into the bag. Producing lipstick, concealer, eyeliner, and many more perfect-for-a-purse sized containers of makeup.

"Why don't you scoot over here and find out?" stated Alexis as she picked up the challenge. Without hesitation, Jaden moved himself over to Alexis and presented his face to her. The blond haired girl quickly got to work, applying eyeliner, shading over any blemishes, working her magic with makeup. Throughout the process, Jaden's face seemed to mold with Alexis's deft touch and makeup application. His cheeks grew soft, his lips puffed slightly, his eyes grew wide and kind. Slowly with each pat of makeup and each push of a brush, Jaden's face was transformed from that of a young, hyperactive male, to that of a calm, yet energetic young woman.

When she finished, Alexis smiled at her work. "See, now if you just practice," offered Alexis, not even noticing that her very motivation for doing the makeup had changed, "I am sure you could master this."

"But Alexis," answered Jaden in a more feminine tone, "You're just so much better at it than me. You know just how to make me,... well, me. Anyway, thanks again for the help. Tell you what, I'll take your next test for you, as payment."

"Thanks for the offer, but I'd rather just pass if you don't mind," countered Alexis with a giggle. Jaden blushed before giving Alexis a quick, playful shove. Alexis let the playful shove take her and she landed with a plop on the quilt, hardly caring that her skirt had come undone and Jaden could now see everything. And why should it matter thought Alexis, stopping her hands as they went to cover herself. They were both girls... no they weren't Jaden was a boy... but she was also a good... had she just referred to Jaden as a she... why not, after all he was a-

"Um, Alexis," interrupted Jaden. Alexis turned to see Jaden blushing slightly. "You are kind of exposed."

Alexis, surprisingly annoyed, slowly stood up and secured her skirt the best she could. Even still, the skirt had lost a button along the way and now barely hung on her hips. Alexis and Jaden then sat down and continued to eat their lunch, unaware just how far the changes had already progressed.

Blair had to make a very serious choice here to either change her fellow Slifer Red neighbor or leave him be. Blair could feel a strange feeling about the card and chose not to play it, finally breaking her silence.

"This duel is over, Syrus. At the start of my standby phase, White Magician Pikeru gains me 400 life points for each creature I control, gaining me 1600 life points. (700 -> 2300) Syrus knew that this duel was done for as Blair then ready her attack, "Trainroid, go attack Syrus's life points directly." Trainroid then gained his 500 attack boost and rammed into Syrus (2800 -> 500) Blair then added, "Now Maiden in Love, give Syrus a big kiss with Cupid's Kiss." The Maiden then readied her bow, aimed it and fired at Syrus, hitting him dead on and sending his life points to zero, knocking him back. (500 -> 0)

The duel field faded away and Blair walked over towards Syrus to help him up as she quickly put her hand back into her deck, and giving him a kind smile as she hoped that she did the right thing in not changing him. "Thanks for the duel, Syrus... Sorry if I went to aggressive on you." Syrus smiled and responded, "Welcome, and you did fine Blair." With that, Syrus wentry back upstairs to his and Jaden's dorm room leaving Blair by herself as she then heard a voice speak to her, "That was a very kind decision you made to your friend, Blair." Shocked by the voice, Blair looked around but saw nothing until she saw a spirit appear next to her, looking very elegant as she looked at the young thirteen year old Silver Red. Blair then asked who the spirt was, and the spirit answered, "I am the Spirit of the Girl's World card that you now own, Blair. If you would of activated the card and defeated your friend, I would of appeared and changed him into what you desired him to become. But, since you didn't play it, I wanted you to know that I existed and will offer my advice if you want it." With that, she disappeared as the sun began to set over the Duel Academy. Blair then went into her dorm room and began to ponder over what she had just heard.
1221212.title: Facing Caution and Making a new friend

1222.content: Blair didn't know much about spell cards, even though she used them alot and was awake during the class. She contacted Professor Banner, but he didn't even know the card's orgin. She was confused that no one knew about the card. She was thinking about people who would be able to know, and she didn't want to ask anyone in Obliesk Blue, so she went back to the Ra Yellow Dorm and saw one of the boys still sitting on the stairs.
1222.title: Contact someone who might know the card

1223.content:
As Blair looked curiously at the card a voice emanated sideways from the magic sticker that seals the quality of the card. Now that it was mentioned, the card sticker was crimson and the card itself was made out of a heavier material than paper.

"Blair."

Blair almost jumped out of her skin, but of course it's impossible to buy that sort of reaction.

"Hello, I'm the card spirit."

By now Blair had almost accepted the logic - But this had to mean that this was a card for changing boys in to girls, no doubt.

"Hello, card spirit." She said formally.

"What and where are you, though?"

"... And why are you here?"

"Heheh, I have the same thoughts as you Blair - I can read your mind."

The mystique in his voice definitely made her shudder in opposition.

"This card actually works - And I know, because I've seen people use it for centuries, my past is a grave, grave one. The only order I'm ever given is to change boys in to girls - And I'm happy with the job. Living until this card is cracked is a big bore - but I'm always rejuvenated when those pesky males eat their words."

Blair's reaction to this was...
1223.title: It speaks to Blair

choices: Let's erase the memory of one of his close friends.
12231.content:
Blair liked the idea of this card.

"Card Spirit!"

"Yes?"

Blair thought to herself.

"If you can read my mind and thoughts, I'm sure that you know three or four things about me right now."

"Yes. But why is your faviroute kind of tree important?"

Blair felt some humiliation over that.

"Yeah, I've just been asking people. I don't know why."

The spirit looked around and made sure no one was around. No one was, it was too early in the morning.Then he whispered something into Blair's ear.

"You like Jaden a lot, don't you?"

Blair hesitated, but the card obviously knew already.

"Yes, I do. Even though he's a tiny bit older than me."

The card spirit explained his in detail.

"You see, my powers aren't just limited to changing boys into girls - I can erase the memory of people, also."

"Ah! I see where you're coming from!" Blair said, with a nod and grin.

"Yes..."
12231.title: Good.

122311.content:
The card spirit looked to his side smugly and muttered...

"I will erase your memory!" He said, in an evil plot-twisting tone!

Blair on the other hand, was dumbfounded and shocked!

"Wait, why?"

The card spirit didn't wait, he rolled up his sleeve to reveal a canister of blue flames embedded in his arm. He plucked one out and threw it at Blair with as much force as was possible.
122311.title: I will erase your memory!

choices: Blair is viced to the spot by her ankles.
1223112.content:
Luckily, by strafing to her left she had dodged the blue flame, which instead hit a blade of grass and dissapparated in a puff of smoke.

"That was a good move." Admitted the card spirit, full of himself.

"But can you dodge this?"

The spirit stuck his hands into the earth and abjacently appeared underneath Blair, so as to grab her feet.
1223112.title: It missed Blair.

choices: She mauled at the closed fists.
12231122.content:
Impossible! No mortal alias of any sort could just have hands the density of cement, yet those shoes were gripped down by such force that she could only note them as frozen!

"Hahah! Got you now, Blair!"

... That was one heck of a statement! There were still so many ways to escape! She wasn't giving in that easily!
12231122.title: Blair is viced to the spot by her ankles.

122311221.content:
Blair had never felt so constrained! If felt like she'd stepped on quick-dry cement and assimilated into it!

She tugged and tugged at her legs using her hands, but the hand twitched in response and then started holding her ankle twice as hard. She couldn't feel her ankle now! It had gone numb from pressure!

"Ouch." Blair said, constrainedly.

It was very early in the morning, in the plain, green big air next to the small cosy Slider Hideout, so no one could see her or do anything about it!

But then see looked at a round, stubbly, uncut rock. Maybe she could get that and smash it into the Card Spirit's hands?

It was worth a try if anything! She outplayed her hand and constrained it out as far as she could. Eventually it was at just the position to grab the rock with. She did the same with the other hand, it was a two-handed pick up rock.

The nauseating, beguiled red eyes looked over at Blair and saw what she was doing. He was clever, the Card Spirit, assuming that the tiki mask made out of cobbled rock was supposed to be a man.

The rock was grabbed, but then the Spirit lifted his hands out of the ground, which meant that his hands were hovering in the sky, assuming that they were his hands, they were disconnected...

Blair was unable to find her centre of gravity in time.

"Rats! Here we go!"

She just had time to shout that before she was bent over in the stomach by the pressure of holding the stone. But, he flew his hands around and sent the rock hurtling towards the beast himself!

Did it hit?
122311221.title: She mauled at the closed fists.

1223112211.content:
Yes! It did! And even better, it hit his ruby-crystal eye, shanking it into a red powder on the grass, this caused the hand to fall forward, as well as the cards' head! He let out a ear-deafening screech, Blair was not able to move any of her limbs, and it was clear that her blood-flow was blocked from moving past her oesophagus or head. She could still hear the spirit.

"I don't want to kill you..."

"Oh yeah?" Sassed Blair, in a crunchy way.

"Merely erase your memory!"

"If anything, that's as bad as dying!"

"I know, but boys are stupid! I want them all gone! You are my instrument! My face of the crime!" Roared the spirit.

Blair regained control over her limbs, but she felt very shivery, like a fish on land! She'd regained control of her limbs but there was absolutely no blood flow in them! It would take a while for the pattern to catch up, so she was still immobile.

Now the card spirit was preparing for a different attack! He wove his hands as if he were knitting and eventually created a wall of strange, glowing fabric. He threw this at the immobile Blair.

It latched on to her head and started vacuuming Blair's memory to pieces! Blair was next to insanity, as her knowledge of what the word 'insanity' means started to get ripped apart. This was some tough neuroscience!

Blair was finally able to move!
1223112211.title: Yes...!

12231122112.content:
Blair tried to unstick the fabric, but it was held on like duct-tape! Also, it covered her whole face! She found it hard to breathe or see through the cloth.

"Please, don't take away this... Don't take my memory!" Blair groaned.

But, even though this Card Spirit seemed near to impossible to beat, she could still do it!

Right?

Yes! Because all actual animals and people, that are animals, can win if they try hard enough!

Upfront, does Blair succeed in 'K.O'ing this foe?
12231122112.title: Take off the mind-absorbing fabric!

123.content:
Jasmine was walking around duel academy, surprisingly without Mindy or Alexis, just having some alone time, which she didn't do much. Her mind was clouded with boys, especially Chazz and Atticus. She was just walking out of the academy when she spotted two things, a card on the ground and a duel. She picked up the card first and put it away in her deck to talk about it with her friends later, she then saw An obelisk blue was dueling a Ra Yellow.
Ra: 100 lps
Obelisk: 400 lps
The Obelisk was Reggie, an arrogant duelist like Chazz from before he left to go to North Academy and come back, he had no spells or traps, only one monster, Warrior Lady of the Wasteland (1100/1200) in Attack mode. The Ra Yellow was a boy named Adam Kaiser, a normal kid from Domino City, he's probobly one the nicest people you can meet, but he doesn't like it when people target his friends. He has a love for dueling and a spirit monster. He had same type of field and also had a monster card, which was his spirit monster, Decoy Dragon. (300/200)
Reggie: (laughs) It's over, Ra Yellow Slime. My monster has more points than yours. Now, Warrior Lady of the Wasteland, attack Decoy Dragon.
Adam: (cracks a smile) Your right, Reggie, this duel is over, for you. By attacking my Decoy Dragon, I can summon any Dragon from Graveyard and It swaps places, meaning you attack the Dragon I select, And I choose the Legendary Blue Eyes White Dragon. (3000/2500)
Blues Eyes then appears in front of Decoy Dragon and hits Warrior Lady of the Wasteland with his tail, destorying he and sending Reggie's life points to 0. After the monsters vanished, Reggie fell to his knees
Adam: That's game, Reggie.
Jasmine then looked at Adam when he turned around, coming up the stairs, since he was suppose to met Jaden at the card shop. Jasmine saw Adam's black kinda spiky hair, (not like Chazz's, but kinda like it), his eyes that looked close to Blue-Eyes's scales, and his smile. When Adam passed Jasmine and said, "Hello.", showed her a smile and then walked into the academy. Jasmine was impressed that he took down Reggie, who is the top freshman this year, that she was in the start of a crush phase, she just didn't know it yet.

choices: Adam is still in the Card Shop
Adam was walking down the stairs
1232.content:
Wanting to avoid making a scene with Adam, Jasmine heads back to the Obelisk Blue Girl's Dorm and passes a few other girls who were heading to the academy. Jasmine walked into the dorm to see Mindy and Alexis, talking to some new freshman girls and showing them around the dorm. So Jasmine waited for the tour to be done so they could talk about the card and the duel between Adam and Reggie.

After a few minutes, Mindy and Alexis comes over to the couch that Jasmine was sitting on. Jasmine was wondering why she found that card and the duel bewteen Reggie and Adam. Mindy smiled at Jasmine and said, "Hi Jasmine, how was your walk?" Jasmine answered back, "It was good, passed some new students, watched a duel, and found a card on the ground." Alexis wanted to know what the card was but Mindy was interested in the duel.

Mindy asked about the duel before Alexis could even mumbled anything about the card. Jasmine said, "Reggie was dueling a Ra Yellow and lost, He looked kinda cute." Mindy, who was like Jasmine in every way, wanted to know who the boy was while Alexis looked like she was about to get a headache but then Alexis asked, "What card did she find?" Jasmine shrugged and said she didn't know. Alexis then got up and said, "If you don't know, then let's find out." The girls followed Alexis to her room and went to her computer while Jasmine pulled out the card and finally saw the name of the card, "Girl's World", it was a field spell card that only can be played by women. It ability increase the female duelist monsters by 500 attack points, but also if she duels a male duelist, their monsters lose 500 attack points. But also if the male loses the duel, He is turned into a female unless the card holder changes her mind.

All three girls were shocked when they looked at the card's ability and after they tried searching for it, it said no data found. Alexis spoke, "Is this some sort of joke?" Mindy was confused why Jasmine found a card that's not even found in the database of duel monsters. Jasmine was thinking, "Maybe the Ra Yellow knows something about the card." She takes the card and puts it in her deck again and then walked towards the door. Mindy said, "Where are you going, Jasmine?" Jasmine answered, "I'm going to see if I can find any info on this card." Jasmine then left the room and then the dorm and started to head back to the academy to find Adam. She thought, "I hope he is still at the academy, or I'll have to walk over to the Ra Yellow Dorm."
1232.title: Go back to the dorm and Find someone

12321.content:
Jasmine sprinted towards the duel academy, passing many other classmates who were heading to their dorms since the classes were done for the day. However, Jasmine figured that the Ra Yellow that she saw earlier was still around the Main Academy, but didn't see him at the front entrance. Jasmine then had a thought of checking the Card Shop, knowing that some people would most likely be buying packs before the shop closed on that Friday evening.

As Jasmine walked down the series of hallways, she finally made her way towards the card shop where Ms. Dorthey was walking around doing her inspection of the shop as several Slider Reds were looking around the tables and racks. Jasmine took an overall glance over the entire shop and saw the Ra Yellow from before, sitting by himself with his cards. Jasmine slowly approached him to see what he was doing more clearly. As Jasmine looked closer, she saw the card from earlier that helped him, Decoy Dragon, laying on the table next to a few unopened packs. Adam was silent, but then broke his silence by saying, "I guess I should make the assumption that you are following me?" Adam then turned to see Jasmine and just had a slight smile on his face as he remembered seeing her from earlier.

Jasmine then replied to Adam's comment and said, "I didn't follow you. I wanted to congratulate you on your match earlier and talk to you." Adam did seem a little uneasy for a moment but then answered, "Thanks and I wouldn't mind a chat with an Obelisk." Jasmine took a seat across for him after he moved his stuff out of the chair and to his side and then asked her, "So, what's your name?" Jasmine smiled as Adam started the conservation with a formal greeting and answered back, "I'm Jasmine." Adam then responded back to Jasmine, "Adam, now what pray tell, brings an Obelisk to talk to a simple Ra Yellow? Most Obelisks I've met won't even look at us lower ranks." Adam whispered the later in respect to some of the Slifers that were still in the shop...

Luna wakes up in her bedroom, by the noise of her alarm clock buzzing. It was 7:00am, Luna then got up and looked at the mirror and saw her green hair was a little messed up. She went over to turn on the light and then back over to the mirror and brushed her hair when it fell naturally to her shoulders. She got dressed in the school uniform, which she had to wear a red jacket, a yellow bow tie, and a black plaid skirt. She then stepped out of her bedroom to eat some breakfast, and sees a letter on the table that was addressed to her. She picks up the envelope and was about to open it when her brother, Leo, walked into the kitchen in his blue jacket, white shirt, blue tie, and black pants. "Morning Sis." were Leo first word to his sister. Luna responded with a smile, "Morning Leo." The morning went quickly and then the twins walked down the stairs of the Tops apartments and exited the main doors and walked towards the Academy.

Leo and Luna were met at the gate by their friends, Patty and Dexter. Patty hugged Luna and Leo did his secret hand shake with Dexter. The gang walked into the main building of the Academy and went to their classroom, since they were all the same age group and same class group.

The teacher asked each student questions about certain spells, monsters, and traps; trying to double check everyone knows about dueling. The boy next to Luna surprised some, since the other boys knew an adequate amount of knowledge. But this boy knew alot more than Dexter, which is saying something. Patty looked over from her desk on the opposing side of Luna's and saw the boy. The boy was wearing the school's uniform blue. His hair was brown and eyes were light blue, but he didn't look towards Patty or Luna, since he was focused on the teacher and the lesson. Patty was wondering why he didn't look around like the other boys in the class. (Exception: Dexter) Luna was focused on the teacher as well and soon Patty refocused on her as well and all three of them listened closely.

After the second bell rings, The class was dismissed and everyone filed out. Patty and Luna walked to the next class with their books. Leo yawned after he left the class with Dexter. The Boy was probobly the last one out of the class with his books under his arms. Luna and Patty saw this from their lockers and Patty's curiosity heighten while Luna's started to bloom. Leo also saw this and also saw the girls looking at the boy. Leo thought to himself and also got curious. They all then went to the next class, all wondering the same thing: who is the student?

He didn't say a word for a bit, until Patty asked,"Are you nervous or scared?," which he responded, "No. I'm just not much into talking much. It takes awhile for me to adapt, as you can tell, I am new here." Patty just smiled and responded, "Well, you don't have to be shy." He just responded, "I'm not shy, just really not in the mood to talk." Patty then said, "Well, you don't have to be alone, you can sit with us." He then had a quick smile, but then it disappeared and responded, "Thanks, Patty." Patty then stood up and asked, "What's your name?" He then said after taking a short breath, "My name is Issac Kaiser." Patty smiled and then walked towards the gang and then Issac followed Patty to the window.

Leo and Dexter were just quiet, but for different reasons. Dexter was quiet since he knew that Patty just embarrassed him in front of the new kid as he was going to at least attempt to talk to Issac "later" but couldn't do it earlier since he was with Leo the whole time and he knew that Leo wasnt gonna talk to someone new without good reason, such as if it was a new girl; Dexter knew that in the center of the swarm would of been Leo...

Leo, however, was in his own little world as he was imagining that he was in "shoes" of a pro duelist as he was dueling from the championship...

Issac and Patty however didn't say much to either one of them as they sat over to the side of them along with Luna with who was also in her own world, but snapped out of it once Patty sat down next to her, seeing Issac; but saying nothing as she was also curious about this new student as Patty could see his deck box clipped to his side...

"This is Luna," Patty began as she started to introduce the gang, going down the list from closest to farthest. "The kid with glasses is Dexter and then you have Luna's twin brother Leo..." Luna focused on Issac and Dexter got out of his daydream to see him as Patty introduced him, "This is Isaac Kaiser."

Dexter quickly saw his deck box and then asked, So what type of deck do you use, Issac?" Luna rolled her eyes as she interjected to Dexter's question, "Really, Dex, that's your first question.." Dexter then defended himself by saving, "Well, you do get to know someone by their deck..." Issac then answered Dexter, "Well...It is kinda hard to explain what it is without saying who my father is or what he does for a living, but you will see it when I have my turn in the simulation."

Luna had alot on her mind, She thought about the mysterious envelope that she received and she wondered who sent it. But that wasn't the only thing, She also had her mind on Yusei and how he was doing, and then the last thing on her mind was Issac. Normally, the academy doesn't just let new students enter during the term and she wondered why he was like the other boys in her class. But just then, she would be able to find out soon.

Patty and Issac sat with the gang, but no one really noticed him except Dexter. Issac and Dexter both started to chat and then Patty then joined in. Isaac smiled and placed his deck back into the pocket and clipped back to his pants and then spoke, "Some of these cards are from my father, a very wise and respectable man, he was top of his class in his Duel Academy, along with mom, he gave me some of his cards because he knew I would treat them with the same respect as he did."

Patty then asked, So, what would be your top card, Issac?" Issac then asked her to explain. Patty countinued, "What card are you mostly know for? Like Yusei is known for his Stardust Dragon, and Jack Atlas is know for his Red Dragon Archfiend." Issac chuckled, with gave them a puzzled look. Then Issac spoke, "My deck is very hard just to pick one favorite. Each card has a story to me and they've all saved me. But I would only know one I've used so many times, he's helped me through most of my duels and got me out of tough scrapes, it would have to be this one." Both were astonished, but then all of astonishment spread, making Leo turning from the window to see what all the fuss was about.

Leo motioned Dexter to follow him and led him to the back of the classroom "did you bring it?" he asked eagerly.

Dexter reached into his backpack and pulled out a whoopee cushion "I still don't think this is such a good idea" he said.

Leo happily took the whoopee cushion from his friend "Patty's a tough girl she can take a little joke besides we're doing fairy monsters in duel PE today and you know what she can do with that deck of hers, I pity anyone who makes fun of her" he said as he quietly sneaked to the desk Patty shard with Luna and placed the whoopee cushion in position.

At that moment Ms. Bartlet came in the room "good morning class I hope you're already for our duel session in the gym" she greeted. "Oh darn it, I forgot my bag in my car" said the teacher scolding herself "take your seats I'll be back in a moment" she said rushing out the door.

Leo watched eagerly from his desk as Patty began to sit down. "Whoa" said Luna as she nearly fell to the floor when her own chair began to loose balance.

"That loose leg acting up?" asked Patty. Luna nodded "here you can have my seat, Sly's out sick today so I'll just borrow his" she said heading across the room to retrieve the chair.

Now Luna began to sit down and from his chair Leo was starting to panic, Luna was by no means weak in any sense of the word but she wouldn't take the prank the way Patty would, Patty would blush, stand up and charge at whoever was responsible but Luna was more likely to take a different route. "LUNA WAIT!" Leo cried but it was too late.

"PFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT TTT" went the whoopee cushion, everyone in class was suddenly looking at Luna who was now blushing deep red and then everyone save for Leo, Dexter, and Patty burst out laughing.

"Whoa Luna, didn't know ya had it in ya" mocked one boy.

"Looks like someone was raised in a barn" said one girl loudly.

"Yeah got a warn people, my mouth was open and everything" said one boy.

Luna looked across the room and saw the sheepish, apologetic look on her brothers face and knew who was responsible.

"It was his idea" said Dexter.

"It wasn't supposed to be you" said Leo.

"Lu are you ok?" asked Patty rushing to her friends side.

Luna looked stunned for a moment then tears began to flood her eyes and soon she ran out the door. "Lu wait" said Patty "nice going guys" she said to Leo and Dexter before taking off after Luna.

"Wait up" said Leo taking for the door himself however when he opened the door he found Patty with Ms. Bartlet who was looking very angry "anyone want to tell me why Luna just ran crying into the girls room?" she asked her class. Leo sheepishly raised his hand.

Meanwhile Luna ran into the first stall in the girls bathroom and let the tears pour out "my own brother" she sobbed loudly. "So typical of him, to do something this immature" she added angrily. "And how could Dexter let him do this?" she asked angrily kicking the wall "he's supposed to be the smart one why didn't he talk Leo to his sense!" she said kicking the toilet paper dispenser nearly sending it off the wall "boys!" she said angrily.

"I couldn't agree more" said a female voice only Luna could hear.
13223.title: Leo's prank

132231.content:
Luna looked around but saw no one “hello” she called.

“Precious girl I’m not in the stall with you, I’m in your pocket” said the voice.

Luna reached into her pocket and took out the envelope “that’s right my dear I’ve chosen you to usurer in a new era, think of your brothers prank, you trusted him, you thought he was your protector and how did he prove himself, by humiliating you!” said the voice.

“I would like to get back at Leo” said Luna.

“All you need is inside this envelope” said the voice.

Luna carefully opened the envelope and found a series of cards, however the one that struck her was the field spell “Girl World” she read.

Meanwhile duel PE was in full swing and Leo was proven right that Patty’s deck was dominating “and now Master Hyperion attacks your Marauding Captain” she announced. From his side of the field Dexter’s Captain was bathed in light and Dexter was thrown back as his life points dropped to zero. “Serves you right for helping Leo with his little prank on Luna!” said Patty.

“It wasn’t my fault!” said Dexter angrily Patty felt the need to give both him and Leo a guilt trip every five minutes. “I’m going to the bathroom” he added frustrated and he did so feeling a pang of guilt as he passed the ladies room. However when Dexter was just outside the gym he found a certain blue haired girl waiting for him “Luna” he said surprised “hey listen I really want to apolo…” he began.

“Let’s duel!” said Luna loudly.

“What?” said Dexter surprised, Luna wasn’t the type to duel her problems away.

“What’s wrong Dexter, don’t tell me a big strong boy like you is afraid of little me” said Luna with a smile.

“What, but, I, whatever fine let’s get in there and find a spot” said Dexter.

“No Dexter we’re doing this right here right now” said Luna as she activated her duel disk.

“Here in the hall?” asked Dexter “well I guess” he said activating his own duel disk.

“Duel!” the two children cried out.

Luna: 4000
Dexter: 4000

“Ladies first Dex” said Luna drawing a card. “I summon Sunny Pixie in defense mode” said Luna as her level one creature, a tiny fairy like creature materialized in front of her flashing its 400 defense points. “Now I’ll place one card face down and give you a shot” said Luna.

Luna: 4000
Dexter: 4000

“Luna I am sorry about what happened” said Dexter “but don’t expect me to go easy on you, my draw! I’m starting off with my field spell Sogen” said Dexter placing the field spell in his duel disk instantly the terrain around two duelists was transformed into a large meadow. “Here all my warrior monsters gain 200 attack and defense points so you better watch out” said Dexter. “Now I summon Marauding Captain!” he announced as his young, blonde, armor clad warrior appeared sporting 1200 attack points and 400 defense points which instantly rise to 1400 and 600. “And thanks to my captain’s ability I can play another warrior from my hand so I summon Command Knight” he announced as yet another warrior with less traditional armor then the captain appeared with 1400 attack and 1900 defense points which rose to 1600 and 2100. “And now for his little trick, all my warrior monsters gain 400 more attack points!” said Dexter, Marauding Captains points rise to 1800 and Command knights to 2000. “Ok Captain take out her little fairy” said Dexter. The Capitan drew his sword and charged at Sunny Pixie.

“Reveal face down!” said Luna her trap card flipped over revealing a picture of an old fashioned perfume bottle with one of those round squeezers “bad perfume!” said Luna as the bottle materialized in front of Sunny Pixie and the captains attack smashed it, suddenly the captain began to cough violently as a wave of aroma washed over him and soon Command Knight was coughing as well “the power of my trap keeps your monsters coughing all through the battle phase so they can’t attack!” said Luna.

“I place one card face down and end my turn” said Dexter.

Luna: 4000
Dexter: 4000

“My move” said Luna drawing a card. “I summon Ballet Master in attack mode” said Luna as an aged level three woman wearing a large pink ballet outfit appeared with 1000 attack and defense points. “Now thanks to her special ability I can call her student from my deck to join our little dance” said Luna taking a card from her deck and putting it into play “I give you Tiny Ballerina!” said Luna and the level two monster resembling a little girl in a ballet outfit like her teacher appeared with 500 attack and defense points.

“Sunny Pixie is level one, Ballet Master is level three, but that Tiny Ballerina is only level two so she can’t bring out her dragon” Dexter thought to himself.

“From my hand I play the spell card known as Makeover” said Luna activating a spell card which pictured a large makeup table, instantly Tiny Ballerina nails were polished, her lips were colored, and she was now wearing a little blush. “That did more than doll up my Ballerina it raised her level by one” said Luna Tiny Ballerina’s level raises from two to three. Dexter knew where this was going “I tune level one Pixie with level three Ballerina and Master” said Luna as her tuner monster surrounded the other two in a green ring and the other two became six balls of light (1+3+3=7) “I give you the majestic, the wise, the powerful, the Ancient Fairy Dragon!” said Luna as her signer dragon a large and blue serpent dragon with long minty hair and silvery butterfly wings appeared with 2100 attack points and 3000 defense points. “Now since my dragon is a light creature I gain 1000 life points because I used Sunny Pixie to summon it” said Luna. “Now before my creature wipes the field with your little warriors she’ll activate her special ability to change up the scenery” said Luna as Ancient Fairy Dragon radiated a powerful light which destroyed the Sogen spell “and now I gain 1000 more life points and I get to add one field spell from my deck to my hand” said Luna as she reached into her deck and took her key card. “Now I activate Girl World” said Luna, now the two duelists were battling a top a fashion runway surrounded by dolls, dresses, make up, flowers, and everything stereotypical of girls and females. “Now here girls rule and boys drool because all female card gain 500 attack and defense points while all male monsters give up 500 attack and defense points” said Luna. Ancient Fairy Dragon’s points rise to 2600 and 3500 while Marauding Capitan’s points 900 attack and 0 defense Command Knight’s points become 1800 and 0 due to the new field spell. “And now my mighty beast rid us of Marauding Capitan!” said Luna Ancient Fairy Dragon fired a golden light from her mouth which hit Dexter’s monster right in the chest sending it to the graveyard and costing Dexter nearly half his life points. “Now I’ll place two cards face down and end my turn” said Luna.

Luna: 6000
Dexter: 2300

To be continued...
132231.title: Luna's Revenge on Dexter part 1

choices: Luna and Leo help Dex cope
1322311.content:
Luna: 6000
Dexter: 2300

Dexter took a few deep breaths, Luna was dueling like a madwoman, countering his attacks, using Pixie as bait, destroying Captain “but still” Dexter thought “I’m not giving up, I play my facedown Call of the Haunted” said Dexter flipping his trap to reveal a tombstone with grey smoke coming out. “It revives one monster from my graveyard and I pick my Marauding Captain” said Dexter as his Captain returned to the field. “Now I sacrifice both Knight and Captain two summon out my Gilford the Legend” said Dexter as both of his warriors vanished only for a new warrior large muscled with a big sword to emerge with an impressive 2600 attack points and 2000 defense points.

“He’s impressive but still a male and we’re fighting in Girl World so he losses 500 attack and defense points” said Luna. Gilford’s points dropped to 2100 and 1500.

“Doesn’t matter because I play Sword of Dragon’s Soul!” said Dexter playing an equip spell “this card raises my monster’s points by 700 and if he battles a dragon it’s destroyed at the end of the battle phase so even if you save your dragon with one of those face-downs she’s toast!” said Dexter. Gilford’s points go to 2800. “Ok Gilford my man, slay that dragon!” said Dexter Gilford leapt at his master’s command.

“I play a spell card, Flattery” said Luna flipping over a quick play spell picturing a young maiden watching a warrior flex his muscles “here’s how it works one of us draws a card and then the other is going to take 500 points of damage for every card the drawer holds, oh and another thing Dexter you pick which one of us draws” said Luna. Dexter looked at his own hand currently he was holding just one card so if he drew Luna would only take 1000 points of damage because of flattery however with his warrior closing in on Ancient Fairy Dragon she’d take another 200 points of damage leaving her with 4800 and while that’s still twice more than his points he’d still have Gilford to widdle down her points next round, on the other hand Luna was currently holding one so if she drew she’d have a total of two which would leave him with only 1300 points but still Gilford would destroy Ancient leaving Luna with 5800 life points. Dexter went over the scenarios as fast as he could but couldn't see what Luna was hoping to gain from all this, was she hopping he’d let her draw and she’d pull a game changer? “Oh I almost forgot to mention Dexter, if you call off your Gilford’s attack neither of us draws” said Luna.

“Now I get it” thought Dexter “she’s hoping I’ll play it safe and call off my attack then she can put her dragon in defense mode on her turn, then to take it out I would have to take 700 points of damage to destroy that dragon” Dexter said to himself. “Looks like the only way out of this, is to destroy Ancient now and make Luna take the damage from Flattery” Dexter thought. “I’ll draw” said Dexter picking up his card, instantly Luna’s flattery card began glowing red and Luna took 1000 points of damage. “Sorry Luna your little plan to get me to chicken out didn’t work” said Dexter “now Gilford slay that dragon” he said his voice beaming with confidence.

“Just like a boy” said Luna “couldn’t wait to destroy my dragon next turn so you continue on and let me take the damage” she went on “it’s ironic because if you’d taken the damage yourself you would’ve been around to see another turn, I reveal my other face down, Abused Maiden Hits Back” Luna announced.

The trapped that flipped over pictured a young girl with scars on her body charging at a warrior “what on Earth is that?” asked Dexter.

Luna giggled “it’s quite the handy card, it can only let out its power when I take effect damage” she announced at that moment Dexter knew why Luna played Flattery “thank you by the way Dexter because now one female monster on my field gains attack points equal to its defense point!”

“Say what?” said Dexter shocked.

Ancient Fairy Dragon let out a mighty roar at Gilford the Legend as her attack points rose from 2600 to 6100! “Ancient Fairy Dragon “attack and end this duel” Luna ordered. Ancient Fairy Dragon let out a burst of light which destroys Gilford the Legend and causes Dexter to take 3300 life points.

Luna: 5000
Dexter: 0

Dexter fell to his knees defeated “great duel Luna you’ve really upped your game” he said, that’s when he noticed that Girl World was still on the field! “Your field spell, but all the holograms should’ve vanished now that the duels done” he said.

Luna giggled again “whoever said it was a hologram?” she asked simply. “You know Dexter you really are a smart boy, but you know nothing about how hard it is to be a girl, how society really treats us, and how much one little prank can cost us” said Luna loudly but then she smiled and added “yet.” Suddenly Dexter was surrounded in a dome of pink smoke!

Back in duel PE the last of the duels were just starting to wind down and Leo was just about to finish off his latest opponent when suddenly there was a high-pitched scream, everyone started to run for the door. “Hey where’s everyone going?” asked Leo as his class his opponent included ran for the hall to find the screams source “ah man I had this guy on the ropes” said Leo before taking off after his class.

In the hall way there was only one brown haired child but no blue haired girl to be seen, she lay amongst a series of warrior cards which were scattered amongst the floor, she was wearing a blue boys uniform which looked a little big on her, her hair had grown since her transformation, her shirt was now budging out with new seedling breasts taking credit, and her skin was now much softer. However Leo recognized the cards on the floor and the glasses on this girls face could be no coincidence. “Dex is that you?” asked Leo not knowing if he was going to like the answer.

“It is” said Dexter practically crying.

“Who did this to you?” asked Leo.

“I don’t know” said Dexter.
1322311.title: The duel continues

choices: Dexter and Patty appear, seeing a surprised Luna
Dexter and Patty appear, seeing an angry Luna
1322312.content:
As Luna prepared to draw her next card, a voice shouted, "Enough, both of you!" Both Dexter and Luna turned to see a young upper class boy, who was only 14, two years over Luna and Leo, dressed in his blue coat and had no red tie, signifying he was an upper class student, walk up from the side after watching Patty's duel with Dexter. Dexter was shocked to see this new face to him actually stop a duel, buf it was short-lived by Luna's retort.

"Who may you the king of games, we are in a middle of a duel, and I intend to finish it." Luna glared at the upper class boy, but all he did was smiled and turned around, saying, "You have no idea how much power that one little card has in it, Luna. It is one with great consequences if used in a state of anger or rage. Think about that next time you challenge your brother's best friend." As the upper class boy left, both duel disks started to malfunction and turned themselves off as the monsters vanished in the sight of the watchers, saying to themselves, "Who was that?" Luna was furious and chased after the upper class boy as she cut around the corner and ran into a familiar kid from earlier in class, the one who came in almost late and sat behind Patty and was very silent, but paid very great attention as he acted more mature than his 13 year old self, but fell over when Luna knocked him over. The boy was already shy enough since it was his first week, even though he was wearing no red tie as well, he was still very shy and didnt look at Luna.
1322312.title: The two are interrupted

choices: Talk to the boy across the street
1323.content: Luna was now a young teen, just moved away from her friends, especially Yusei. Their parents want their kids to live with them, which was far away from New Domino. Luna and Leo saw their new home, it was a big house near the beach and was is a very populated suburb where most of the rich lived. She looked around the house and choose the room on the top floor which looked across the street. Luna went up to the window and saw a boy sitting in front of a house just like thiers. The boy looked up and saw Luna and waved at her, Luna smiled and waved back and went away to check on her family and help get her stuff into her new room like Leo was doing in his room, one floor down. Along many of Luna's bedroom ideas were her deck and duel disk, but there was also a envelope with a new card in it, the card was known as "GIRL'S WORLD: This card can only be activated by a female duelist. If this card is activated female gender monsters gain 500 attack and defense points and cannot be destroyed in battle, while male gender monsters lose 500 attack and defense points. Once activeted this card cannot be destroyed. If your opponent is a male duellist, if he loses the duel, this card will change him into a female duelist". She didn't know it, but her life would be changed forever.
1323.title: 14 (After she moves away)

choices: Leo comes and checks on her
13231.content: Luna went downstairs to grab another box of her stuff, Her parents were making lunch. Her mother was making some of her tea while her dad was making the sandwichs. You knew the story of how they met and you thought it was romantic, Her mom met her dad at Duel Academy when they were younger. He was from North Academy and enter Duel academy on his last year. He and Mom had alot in common and their love flourished. His real name was Jesse Anderson and their mother's were Judai Yuki. Luna then heads back upstairs with another box which had her duel disk and deck and some of her small things and gifts from her friends back in New Domino. Luna entered her room and placed her box on the floor and started to unpacked that box.

choices: Looks what is inside the envelope
Talk to the boy across the street
132312.content: While Luna was unpacking, she saw the envelope and looked curiously at it, but didn't open it just yet. Luna kept unpacking her stuff and then moved on to her clothes and put them in the drawers and put the fancy clothes in the closet. Luna was thinking about the boy from across the street, but she didn't let him distract her from finishing. Time went by as the noon turned to mid-afternoon, Luna finished by two and went down to eat her lunch. While she was eating, she was think aboit the envelope and what was inside it and the boy from across the street. Her parents knew she was thinking of something but wanted to give her some privacy. After Luna finished her lunch and wejt up to check on Leo, who was resting on his bed. Luna didn't want to disturb him, so she walked up to her room and went to the window and saw the boy with a duel disk and cards, showing he was a duelist as well. Luna then turned and looked at the envelope and was curious about its contents. What does Luna do?

choices: A voice speaks to Mina's mind as she relaxes...
134.content:
(Author's Note: The Story will begin around the Dark Signers Part of the Series)

After Mina left Jack's side, she was walking around the Sector Security Building in the heart of New Domino City, trying to at least calm down from the rejection from Jack as he would rather be with somebody else than his part-time manager. She sat in her office and just started to rethink the past few hours, getting interrupted as her intercom buzzed. Mina quickly got out of her peaceful trance and touched the button on her intercom and spoke, "What is it?" Mina heard the voice on the intercom answer, "Sorry to bother you, Miss Simington, but the newest batch of inmates are in and are ready to be inspected if you would like to come down." Even though Mina would like something to distract her, she just wanted a few moments of peace and quiet and answered back to the voice, "I'm busy at the moment, but thanks for letting me know." Mina then clicked the off her little com and just leaned back into her chair and sighed as she started to slip into her peaceful trance. However, it wasn't going to last long as someone was watching her. Mina had a lot on her mind and was trying to not focus on her jealous side due to Jack, but it did start to bother her as it continued to enter her mind.
134.title: Mina's Beginning

135.title: Other choices

1351.content: So is the misterious blondy from France, I presume, that has the card. But in which period did she get it?
1351.title: Sherry Leblance

13511.content:
Sherry LeBlanc was wandering around Neo Domino City thinking about who to recruit for her team. She needed to gather a team together for the Grand Prix so she could face off against Yliaster to get revenge for her family.

As she thought what to do she was blinded by a bright light, and when it was gone there was a card left in its place. Sherry picked up the card which was a field spell called GIRLS WORLD:"This card can only be activated by a female duelist. If this card is activated female gender monsters gain 500 attack and defense points and cannot be destroyed in battle, while male gender monsters lose 500 attack and defense points. Once activated this card cannot be destroyed. If your opponent is a male duelist, if he loses the duel, this card will change him into a female duelist".

She was interested in the card that she found. Sherry figured that she could try it out on a male duelist and maybe she could use it to recruit members for her team. Her victim was going to be Yusei.

Sherry found him at his teams garage and arranged a duel with him. Sherry smiled as she started off the duel confident that she was going to win.

She drew her first card and summoned her first monster. " I summon Horse of the Floral Knights in defense position, and when I summon it I can draw 1 card. Next I will place two face down cards and end my turn.

Now it was Yusei's turn, "I send my Quillbolt hedgehog from my hand to the graveyard in order to summon quickdraw synchron in defense position. My next move is to summon speed warrior in attack position (900). I will then tune my quickdraw synchron with my speed warrior in order to synchro summon Junk Archer (2300). I then use Junk Archer's effect to banish one of your monsters til the end of the turn. Junk Archer fired an arrow which hit Horse of the Floral Knights and it disappeared into the void. Then Junk Archer began its attack on Sherry.

"Not so fast, I activate my trap card Floral shield which negates your attack and I get to draw another card." Sherry said. She smiled as the card she drew was GIRLS WORLD which she could use next turn."I place one face down card and end my turn" Yusei said as Horse of the Floral Knights returned to the field.

Sherry could finally try out her new card as she drew from her deck. " I summon Sacred Knight Joan to the field in attack position (1900). Then I activate the field spell card GIRLS WORLD." The land around the duelists became pink as they were surrounded with dresses, dolls, shoes, makeup, and everything girly. As Yusei stood in shock of his new surroundings, Sherry explained the effects of the card. "This card reduces the attack and defense of all male monsters by 500 points, while female monster gain 500 attack and defense alongside being immune to destruction by battle. Yusei was in awe of the powerful card he faced. With GIRLS WORLD active Joan had enough attack points in order to destroy Junk Archer. "When Joan attacks she loses 300 attack points for the battle so you take 300 points of damage." With that Sherry ended her turn.

"It’s not over yet, I summon my Junk Synchron in attack mode and his ability lets me summon a level 2 or lower monster from my graveyard in defense mode. I bring back my speed warrior, and since a turner in on the field I can summon my Quillbolt hedgehog to the field. I then tune my Junk synchron to my quilbolt hedgehog to synchro summon Junk warrior (2300). He may lose 500 attack points due to GIRLS WORLD, but he gains 400 thanks to speed warrior. I then equip lightning blade to him to give him another 800 attack boost and attack your Sacred Knight Joan." Junk Warrior rushed forwardd and punched Joan dealing 600 points of damage although Joan was safe due to GIRLS WORLD. Yusei placed another card face down and then it was Sherrys turn.

"I will end this duel this turn" Sherry said with confidence. “I summon necro fleur in defense mode and activate the spell card fleur switch. I destroy my necro fleur and summon fleur synchron from my deck to the field and I get to increase the level of Horse of the Floral Knights by 1. Also when necro fleur is destroyed by a card effect I can summon Sorciere de fleur to the field (2800+500), and when she is summoned I can summon one of your monsters from the graveyard to my side of the field. I bring out your speed warrior over to my side."

Yusei couldn't believe that Sherry had already summoned 4 monsters in one turn although she wasn't done yet. “My next move is to use speed warrior, Horse of the Floral Knights, and fleur synchron to synchro summon Chevelier de fleur onto the field (2700+500). Plus when fleur synchron is used for a synchro summon I can summon a level 2 or lower monster from my hand, and I pick another fleur synchron." Now it was time for Sherry to begin her attack and she started with her Sorciere de fluer. It attacked Junk warrior as Yusei tried to defend it by activating his trap card scrapmetal scarecrow, but Chevalier de fluer has the ability to negate a spell/trap card once per turn. The attack continued as Yusei lost 300 more life points. Next fleur syncron attacked Yusei followed by the finishing blow from Chevelier de fleur. Sherry was excited to see the effects of winning the duel on Yusei.

Yusei accepted his defeat while not knowing that he was beginning to change from GIRLS WORLD.

What did he start to change into?
13511.title: During the Grand Prix

135111.content: Did he change gradually or instantly?
135111.title: Replica of Sherry

1351112.content:
A flash of light occured, and when it faded, an exact physical duplicate of Sherry stood in Yusei's place. The only difference were the color of her clothes. While the original Sherry was wearing a white uniform, the new one was wearing a blue one.

Sherry admired the work of her new card and then said " It's incredible. With this card I can create my own Team to defeat Iliaster. But I wonder if "she" is now different in the mind as well".

Will Yusei still be in there? Or has the card changed is mind as well?
1351112.title: Instantly

13511122.content:
Yusei had her mind changed by the card spirit.

She now had all of Sherry's interests and the same personality. She also loved her sister and was completely loyal to her. The new girl Cherry happily greeted her sister as they talked about the tournament.

Sherry was ecstatic that the plan had worked and now she had a new loyal member. She wanted to spend time with her new sis, but she had to recruit one more main member for her team. Sherry also wanted at least one back up teammate.

She thought that team 5ds still had some good members so she went off to recruit one of them.
13511122.title: Mind changed

135111221.content: Sherry decided that it would be great to have Jack Atlas on her team. Sherry sent Cherry off on an errand to get things prepared. After giving her sister a hug and seeing her off, Sherry went back to her plan. She wasn't sure how people would react to her new sister, she didn't want to draw any suspicions from the people she was trying to recruit, "Maybe I could ask the card spirit later " she thought. Either way she needed to be quick to catch Jack in time, she might need more members afterwards. She was ready to head out and knew that with a powerful team just like her, she could win it and get revenge on Yliaster.
135111221.title: Jack

1351112211.content:
As Sherry was heading out to find Jack she couldn't help but notice a card on the ground shining with a pink glow. She picked up the card to see what it was. The name of the card was 'Girl's Unity.'

Girl's Unity- Continuous spell card- All female monsters you control gain 200 attack for each female monster on the field. Once per turn you can select one monster your opponent controls who's original attack is less than the total original attack of all female monsters you control ; take control of that monster and turn it into a female monster. Cannot activate when Girl's world is on the field. A male duelist defeated by the owner of this card is changed into a female.

"Perfect" thought Sherry. It was good to have more options with cards to transform her opponents plus now she had a better chance of drawing one. With that, Sherry continued her search invigorated by her find.
1351112211.title: Sherry finds a card on the way

155111.title: Yes

Suddenly she heard someone coming. "What do you need Yuzu?" Yuya asked as he entered the room.

Yuzu smiled seeing that she had the perfect chance. "I just got a new card and I was hoping to try it out in a duel." All she could do now was hope he would accept.

"Sure Yuzu, I got to practice my pendulum summoning anyway." She struggled to hide her excitement as they went to the field where the action duel was going to take place. The action field was chosen and the duel began.

She half way dueling Yuya when she draws the card.


"GIRL'S WORLD: This card can only be activated by a female duellist. If this card is activated female gender monsters gain 500 attack and defense points and cannot be destroyed in battle, while male gender monsters lose 500 attack and defense points. Once activeted this card cannot be destroyed. If your opponent is a male duellist, if he loses the duel, this card will change him into a female duellist".

1551312111.content:
She wins the duel and Yuya is about to congratulate her when a strange pink light starts to envelope him.

"Well done chosen one. You now have a choice. He can become your twin or an female version of your self. Choose now."
1551312111.title: She wins the duel

15513121111.content:
"Iv always wanted a twin sister." She giggles. "So I think Yuya will become my twin."

"Very good chosen one shall reality change also, so no one knows anything has changed."
15513121111.title: Her twin

155131211111.content: "Very good chosen one. Your four worlds are now one again. The two gorups of four who share a face you and your sister are the only who now exist. Now how do you want her personality to be?"
155131211111.title: Change reality

1551312111111.content:
"Very well you two shall be two peas in a pod down to the last detail. If anything should change you it should change her as well. Now here a second copy of the card. You and your sister are both the chosen ones now and its your duty to use this card. Do you understand?" A second copy of girls world appears in her hand.

She nodded.

"Can Yuya name now be Kerina?"

"Of course chosen one. Good luck on your quest."

Just then she pink light around Yuya disappears, and all though she did not realise tell now time seems to start up again.
1551312111111.title: Exactly like me

15513121111111.content:
"Hey sis good duel." Celina says offering her sister a hand up. She notices they are dressed exactly a like down to their bracelet. But which now seems to be removable. She also knew nobody would be able to tell the pair apart.

She smiles taking her sisters hand. " Yeah good duel sis."

The two sisters hug.

"Well sis here I got a second copy of that powerful card, and its yours."

"Thanks ever so much." She beams at Celina.

"No prob sis."

She reads it. "Good thing I always been a girl right sis, or this card could have some serious consequences."

Celina laughs and nods glad to see she never remember Yuya or the others girls and boys who shared their faces. She was struggling to recall the names after the magic that just happend.

Just then Sora shows up

"Coach K!" He runs up to Kerina

"Hey Sora!" She gives him a sisterly hug.

He smiles up at her "Coach K would you duel me, help me test my new deck."
